member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether Content Manager should create an alternative container for a duplicated email message, rather than creating a new record

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.AlternateWorkgroupServerName
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the name of an alternative Workgroup Server to use to connect to this database. The alternate workgroup is used if the main workgroup server is unavailable.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.AlternateWorkgroupServerPort
member.summary: Gets or sets a number value to indicate which RCF port to use to connect to the alternative Content Manager Workgroup Server. Note that this will only be used if you specify a value for alternateWorkgroupServerName.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.AlternateWorkgroupServerURL
member.summary: Gets or sets the URL used to connect to the alternative Content Manager Workgroup Server. The URL is in the format {protocol}://{machine}:{port}. Protocol and port components are optional and will default to TCP and 1137, respectively.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.AlwaysCheckSpelling
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether a spelling check should be enforced for every user upon any modifications to Title and Notes fields.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.AttachActionReferenceFileToEmail
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean indicating whether to a attach a record action reference file to an email notification.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.AuditActive
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether events should be logged to the Content Manager Audit Log.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.AuditLogContainer
member.summary: Gets or sets a Record object which is used as a container when cataloguing audit logs into Content Manager

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.AuditLogRecordType
member.summary: Gets or sets a RecordType object which is used when cataloguing audit logs into Content Manager

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.AutoConnect
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether an automatic connection should be made to the workgroup server. If turned off (it is on by default), you can start the Database in an 'offline' mode which allows certain objects to be managed without a workgroup connection.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.AutoFinalizeEmail
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean parameter indicating that when creating a record from an email message, automatically finalize the record.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.AutoGenerateThumbnail
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating that a thumbnail rendition should be automatically generated for a %b_record%.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.AutoVitalRecordReview
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether Vital Classifications and Records must automatically have a Vital Record Review and Update assigned. This will cause all records with Scheduled Tasks attached to be automatically processed and placed in the Scheduled Tasks Due tray of the responsible location when the due date for the Scheduled Task arrives. An email notification will also be sent to the responsible location upon this event.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.BlueprintsConverted
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value to indicate whether all Document Templates and Content Blocks have been converted to the new Office 2007 Open XML format

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.BypassBobChildListLimits
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether a site can bypass the BOBchildList limits

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.CalculateDispositionEvents
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether Schedule events should be created for this database and processed by the Event Server. This property also enables the calculation and recalculation of Retention Schedule Trigger dates whenever these events occur (upon the creation/modification of any Retention Schedules) and activates Pending Event Search functionality.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.CascadeClassifications
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether a classification applied to a folder or a box should be cascaded down to all its contents

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.CascadeClassificationSchedules
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating that when a schedule is changed on a classification, it should be cascaded down to all records within that classification.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.CascadeContainerFields
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean parameter indicating that, when creating a new record relevant user-defined field values will be copied from the container to the new record.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.CascadeParentFields
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean parameter indicating that, when creating a new record for a classification, client or matter, relevant user-defined field values will be copied from the parent item to the new record.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.CatalogAuditLogs
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether to catalog offline audit log files into Content Manager

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.ChatBreakInterval
member.summary: Gets or sets a number indicating how many minutes a chat needs to be silent before determining the chat is complete.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.CheckFileTypesInContainers
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether the contained documents within container file types should also be checked for file type cataloguing rules.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.CheckForDuplicateDocuments
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether Content Manager should check for duplicate documents when creating new records (requires Document Hashing feature to be enabled)

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.CheckForDuplicateEmailMessages
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether Content Manager should check for duplicate email messages when creating new records based on email messages

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.ClassificationLastNumber
member.summary: Gets the last number used for creating top level classifications.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.ClassificationsNeedApproval
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether classification require an approval process before being available for use.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.ClassificationTopPattern
member.summary: Gets the numbering pattern used for top level classifications.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.ClassifiedSecurity
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether the Classified Security functionality specific to Us DoD (United States Department of Defense) 5015.2 compliance should be activated. Corresponds to the Classified Security product feature.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.ClientDocumentCacheSize
member.summary: Gets or sets a number indicating how many megabytes to reserve for a client side document cache for Content Manager. Content Manager will remove older documents if the client document cache exceeds this limit. You must enable document caching using the UseClientDocumentCache parameter before this setting will take effect.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.ClientRecordAccessReferenced
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether the client record provides access control and security references to all records for that client

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.CloseItemsWhenActionsInProgress
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether a container can be closed when one or more contained items have actions in progress.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.CloseItemsWhenAssigneeSet
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether a container can be closed when one or more contained items have an assignee specified.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.CloseItemsWhenCheckedOut
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether a container can be closed when one or more contained items are checked out.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.CollectUpdateComments
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether to display an update comment facility for audit log entries

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.ConfirmContactValidation
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether strict validation for Record contacts should be used. When true, the user is forced to validate (via KwikSelect) every contact selection made.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.ConfirmLocationValidation
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether strict validation for all Record locations should be used. When true, the user is forced to validate (via KwikSelect) every location selection made.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.ConsignmentApprovalReminderDays
member.summary: Gets or sets a number indicating how many days to wait before sending a reminder to consignment approvers to complete the approval process

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.ConsignmentLogContainer
member.summary: Gets or sets a Record object which is used as a container when cataloguing consignment logs into Content Manager

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.ConsignmentLogRecordType
member.summary: Gets or sets a RecordType object which is used when cataloguing consignment logs into Content Manager

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.ContainerRulesForAlternate
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating that containment rules should apply to alternative containers as well as the main container.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.ContentEngine
member.summary: Gets a ContentEngineType enumerated value indicating the which content indexing engine is used with this dataset.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.ContentQueryOptimization
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean parameter indicating that when a record search includes a clause based on searching the document content, the query should be optimized to use metadata in the content engine where possible.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.CreateUdfChangedEvents
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether to create an event whenever an additional field value is modified

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.CurrencyDecimalDigits
member.summary: Gets or sets an integer containing the number of digits to be displayed after the decimal symbol for the currency used in this database.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.CurrencyDecimalSymbol
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the decimal symbol to be used for the currency in this database. For example '.' or ','.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.CurrencyGroupingFmt
member.summary: Gets or sets an integer indicating how the currency should be grouped in this database. That is, it indicates how many numbers should be assembled in each group. For example, the value '3' will correspond to a grouping: '123,456,789'. The separation character is held in the database.currGroupingSymbol property

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.CurrencyGroupingSymbol
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the grouping symbol to be used for the currency in this database. For example ',' or ' '. This determines the separator used in the number arrangement of numbers before the decimal symbol in this currency. The grouping format is held in the database.currGroupingFmt property

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.CurrencyNegativeFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets a number indicating how negative currency amounts should be displayed in this database. The integer values correspond to the following set formats: 0: '($1.1)', 1: '-$1.1', 2 '$-1.1', 3 '$1.1-', 4 '(1.1$)', 5 '-1.1$', 6 '1.1-$', 7 '1.1$-', 8 '1.1$-', 9 '-1.1 $', 10 '-$ 1.1', 11 '1.1 $-', 12 '$ 1.1-', 13 '$ -1.1', 14 '1.1- $', 15 '($ 1.1)', 16 '(1.1 $)'.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.CurrencyPositiveFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets a number indicating how positive currency amounts should be displayed in this database. The integer values correspond to the following set formats: 0 '$1.1', 1 '1.1$', 2 '$ 1.1', 3 '1.1 $'.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.CurrencySymbol
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the symbol for the currency used in this database. For example '$'.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.CurrentUser
member.summary: Gets the Content Manager Location corresponding to the current logged in user.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.CurrentWorkgroup
member.summary: Gets a string containing the name of the current Workgroup Server. Use the property WorkgroupServerName to specify which Workgroup Server to use for a new connection.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.DataSecurity
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether records with a higher Security Profile than the Current User should not be retrieved (and displayed amongst the search results) when searching in this database. The value of this property is true by default.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.DblClickContainers
member.summary: Gets or sets a DblClickContainerStyle enum that determines what happens when a user double clicks on a container

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.DblClickDocsDesktop
member.summary: Gets or sets a DblClickStyle enum that determines what the happens when a user double clicks on a document in %R_DESKTOP%

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.DblClickDocsTrim
member.summary: Gets or sets a DblClickStyle enum that determines what the happens when a user double clicks on a document in %R_TRIM%

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.DblClickExtLink
member.summary: Gets or sets a external link to run when a user double clicks on a record

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.Dbms
member.summary: Gets a databaseTypes enumerated value indicating the type of DBMS used for this Content Manager dataset.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.DeclassifyYears

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.DeduplicationThreshold

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.DefaultAssigneeFromClassificationOwner
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether the default assignee for a record should be based on the Owner Location of a selected classification.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.DefaultOwner
member.summary: Gets a ldLocationDefault value indicating whether the default setting for a new record's owner location (unless otherwise specified) should be the assignee, or the assignee's organization.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.DefaultStoreForConsignmentApprovals
member.summary: Gets or sets the Content Manager ElectronicStore object which will be used as a default for storing all consignment approval documentation

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.DefaultStoreForWorkingCopies
member.summary: Gets or sets the Content Manager ElectronicStore object which will be used as a default for storing all working copies of documents

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.DelegatesCanApproveConsignments
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean parameter indicating whether delegated locations can approve a consignment on behalf of the nominated approver.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.DeleteEmailCaptureDuplicates
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value to determine whether a captured email that is a copy of an email filed by a user should be deleted.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.DocumentSecurity
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether records with a higher Security Profile than the Current User should not available for document operations (view, edit, etc). Only relevant if the DataSecurity property is false. The value of this property is true by default.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.DocumentSingleInstancing
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether the storage system will do single instancing for documents that are no email messages

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.DocumentsOnlyWithinFolders
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether records that behave as documents may only be contained within records that behave as a container. It prevents a document from being directly filed under a classification. by default.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.EmailActivitySupervisors
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean parameter indicating whether the supervisor of an activity should be added to the cc list for any email notifications sent out regarding that activity.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.EmailAssignee
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether a email should be sent to a new record assignee.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.EmailExpandOrganisations
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean parameter indicating that when sending an email to an activity assignee, if the assignee is an organization, expand the organization to include members of the organization

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.EmailSecurity
member.summary: Gets or sets an emailSecurityMode enumeration value indicating whether email should be annotated with standard security annotations

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.EmailSubjectPrefix
member.summary: Gets or sets a string value specifying a subject prefix to place on any email message that has been catalogued into %R_TRIM%.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.EmailSubjectSuffix
member.summary: Subject suffix to flag email messages sent to Content Manager

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.EmlAttachmentSingleInstancing
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether the storage system extracts attachments from EML email messages, single instancing them separately and replace the embedded attachment with a store item reference

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.EmptyRecycleBinAfter
member.summary: Gets or sets a number indicating when to automatically empty the record recycle bin (a specified number of days).

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.EnableScheduledTasks

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.EndOfDay
member.summary: Gets or sets an integer containing the number of seconds since midnight indicating the time the working day usually ends. This is used to calculate the timing of Record Action Tracking and Workflows.

member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether email addresses are unique

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.HideCopyLink
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean indicating whether the Copy Link task is visible.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.HideCustomRecordTypes
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether custom record types (those with a non-blank ExternalId property) should be hidden from users of standard Content Manager client applications

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.HideSQLFromClients
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean parameter indicating if SQL should be hidden from client interfaces. This affects the content of error messages produced by the server and also turns off client side SQL logging

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the Database id for this Database. Setting this property will make a connection to the specified database.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.IgnoreAccentsInWordIndexes
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value to indicate whether Content Manager should ignore accents on characters when word indexing text containing them. If enabled, words containing accents are treated identically to the same word spelt without access on any characters.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.InsecureCurrent

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.InsertEmailForSecurityMarkingsWithHeader
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean parameter indicating if the security annotations should be added to email headers of outgoing mail

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.IsAddToNotesMandatoryOnRecycle

member.summary: Gets a Boolean indicating whether this dataset supports storing Unicode text strings.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.IsValid

This property indicates if the Database is in a valid state to be used, and should be queried prior to connecting to the database. If the query indicates the database is invalid the Database.ErrorMessage property is populated with a description of the problem.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.JitcCompliant

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.LastDayInFiscalMonth

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.LastMonthInFiscalYear

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.LocationCacheSize

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.LocationFormatShowHonorific
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether any title (honorific) belonging to the person should be displayed for 'Person' type locations.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.LocationFormatShowPostNominal
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether any suffix (post-nominal) belonging to the person should be displayed for 'Person' type locations.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.LocationFormatSurnameFirst

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.LocationRelationshipChangesInOnlineAuditLog
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether location relationship changes should be recorded in the online audit log

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.LockdownSettings
member.summary: Gets or sets an lkLockdownStyles enum value indicating the type of lock down to apply to this database. This feature affects how users may use or modify Global Settings, making it possible to force users to use Global Settings. The values are 'lkNormal' (No lock down - Users can get global settings, and are also allowed to modify settings), 'lkSessionLock' (Session Lock down - Users can modify settings but the new settings are not retained past the current logged-on session) and 'lkTotalLock' (Lock down - Users are not allowed to change any settings, they must use the global settings).

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.LoginsInOnlineAuditLog
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether login and logout events should be recorded in the online audit log

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.LogStorageTransfers
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether to create an audit log entry whenever a document is transferred to a different storage device

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.LogWebServiceLogins
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether an event should be created when a user logs in or out using a web service.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.MatterRecordAccessReferenced
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether the client record provides access control and security references to all records within a matter

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.MergeCopiedAccessDefaults
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether to use the access control copy style of the record type if the access control copy style of the classification is not specified.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.MinimumThesaurusLevels
member.summary: Gets or sets an integer indicating the minimum number of required Thesaurus Terms whentitling records by Thesaurus in this Database.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.ModifyLogsPreviousValues

member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether reminder email notifications should be sent regarding outstanding todo items.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.NotifyUndoneAction
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether an email notification should be sent to all responsible locations when an Action is Undone to a record.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.NotifyUserOptionChanges
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether changes to a user's preferred options should be notified to all machines on the network

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.NotifyWorkflowMail
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether an email notification should be sent to the responsible location when an event occurs in a Workflow Activity. The detailed settings are applied in the workflow definition itself.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.ObjectCacheSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the default size for the caching of objects in the Content Manager business object cache.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.ObjectURLFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets an ouObjectUrlFormats enum value indicating which web-based product the URL should be formatted to work with, when embedding URLs in reference files.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.OneDriveEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating if check in and check out to OneDrive is enabled for this dataset

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.OnlyEmailTRIMRefsToTRIMUsers
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether Content Manager Record References will only be sent to locations that can log in to Content Manager. Any addressee locations that are not able to log in to this database will be sent an email without the Record Reference, but the actual document attached.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.OtherBarcode
member.summary: Gets or sets a bpBarcodePrintOption enum value indicating which function should occur when printing barcodes for non-record objects (for example, Locations). The values are 'bpInternal' (Print Content Manager Barcode) which utilizes the Content Manager internal barcode and the foreign barcode to be retained, 'bpInternalClear' (Print Content Manager Barcode, Clear Any Foreign Barcode) which utilizes the Content Manager internal barcode and removes the foreign barcode upon printing, or 'bpExternal' (Print Foreign Barcode, if it exists) which utilizes the foreign barcode rather than the Content Manager internal barcode.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.OtherPrefetchBuffer
member.summary: Gets or sets a number indicating how many items to prefetch when displaying a non-record related search results.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.OverdueActionReminder
member.summary: Gets or sets a number indicating how many days should elase before sending an overdue action reminder email. 0 indicates to not send reminders.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.OwnerFromContainer
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether the default owner of a new record (unless otherwise specified) should be determined from the owner location of its container, if it has a container record.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.PaperFoldersBypassRecordTypeRestriction
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether Paper Folder records ignore the 'Restrict To Record Type'.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.PrefetchForeignBarcodes
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean parameter to indicate whether foreign barcodes are prefetched when prefetching Content Manager objects into the client side object cache.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.PrefetchRecordCount
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether to prefetch result counts when running a search from user interface.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.PrefetchRecordCountUnfiltered
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether to prefetch an unfiltered result count when running a search from user interface. This can be used to indicate to users that there are x number of results that they don't have access to.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.PreventDeleteInArchiving
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether record metadata can be deleted when performing a 'Destroy' disposal action.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.PreventDuplicatedDocuments
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether Content Manager should prevent users from storing duplicate documents (requeires Document Hashing feature to be enabled

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.PreventDuplicatedMailMessages
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether Content Manager should prevent users from storing duplicate mail messages

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.PreventSendToRecycleWithUncompletedAction
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean parameter indicating whether records with uncompleted actions are allowed to be sent to the recycle bin.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.PreventUnspecifiedFileTypes
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating that files that have an unspecified file type (extension) are not allowed to be catalogued.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.PreventZeroByteFiles
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating that files that are 0 bytes in length should not be allowed to be added to the repository.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.ProtectedEmailDomains
member.summary: Gets or sets a semicolon separated list of urls representing email domains that may be processed by the email link server.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.ReadOnly
member.summary: Gets a boolean value indicating whether this database is in a read-only state and cannot be updated.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.RecentDocumentsLimit
member.summary: Gets or sets a number that limits how many documents are kept in the '%E_tt_documents%' view

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.RecordAssigneeDefault
member.summary: Gets a CurrLocDef enum value indicating whether the default setting for a new record's assignee location (unless otherwise specified) should be the current user (that is, the user who is logged on and creating the new record), the current user's position, or the current user's organization.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.RecordBarcode
member.summary: Gets or sets a bpBarcodePrintOption enum value indicating which function should occur when printing barcodes for records. The values are 'bpInternal' (Print Content Manager Barcode) which utilizes the Content Manager internal barcode and allows the foreign barcode to be retained, 'bpInternalClear' (Print Content Manager Barcode, Clear Any Foreign Barcode) which utilizes the Content Manager Context internal barcode and removes the foreign barcode upon printing, or 'bpExternal' (Print Foreign Barcode, if it exists) which utilizes the foreign barcode rather than the Content Manager internal barcode.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.RecordCacheSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the default size for the caching of records in the Content Manager business object cache.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.RecordOwnersInAuditLog
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether the owner of a record should appear in the offline audit log when displaying events for records

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.RecordPrefetchBuffer
member.summary: Gets or sets a number indicating how many records to prefetch when displaying a record search result.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.RelaxedActionDates
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether actions may be added to a record with a starting date earlier than the due date of existing actions already attached to the record. If true, it means that more than one action may simultaneously be active for a record. The only restriction is that the starting date of new Procedures added to the record must not be earlier than the starting date of the first (earliest starting) action on the record.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.RelaxedDates
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether chronological discrepancies in date checking should be ignored or not. That is, whether date comparisons between Date Registered, Date Created, Date Closed, Last Action Date and Retention Review Date fields should be suppressed during record creation and modification.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.RenumberWhenMovedToNewContainer
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating that when a record's container is changed, its number should be changed to reflect the new container.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.ReportAddInMemoryLeaks
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating if Content Manager should prompt when external add-ins create memory leaks.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.RescheduleActionsIfFinishEarly
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether subsequent actions should be automatically rescheduled when an action is completed early.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.RescheduleActionsIfFinishLate
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether subsequent actions should be automatically rescheduled when an action is completed late.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.RmTerminology
member.summary: Gets or sets a rmTerminologyType enum value indicating which style of captioning to use for records management concepts

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.RoundRequestToNextHalfFullHour
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether a record request datetime should be round the the next half or full hour.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.SaveTransparentRedactions
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether, upon creating a redaction from an original record, a transparent form of the redaction should be saved as a rendition of the original record.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.ScanDocumentForAIPSecurityMarkings
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean parameter indicating if the document should be scanned for a security level, eg [SEC=TOP SECRET]

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.ScanEmailForSecurityMarkings
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean parameter indicating if the subject of email messages should be scanned for a security level, eg [SEC=TOP SECRET]

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.SchemaVersion
member.summary: Gets an integer containing the version number of the Database schema.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.SecurityMailAddress
member.summary: Gets or sets the Location to whom an email notification should be sent in the event of a Security Breach. A Security Breach occurs when a record is moved to a location of a lower security profile than its own security profile.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.ServerDocumentCacheSize
member.summary: Gets or sets a number indicating how many megabytes to reserve for a document cache for an SDK-based service application.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.ServiceLocationCacheSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the default size for the caching of locations in the Content Manager business object cache, when the cache is inside a service program.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.ServiceObjectCacheSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the default size for the caching of objects in the Content Manager business object cache, when the cache is inside a service program.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.ServiceRecordCacheSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the default size for the caching of records in the Content Manager business object cache, when the cache is inside a service program.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.ShredderDelete
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether a 'Shredder Delete' should be used for electronic documents. With this option set to true, electronic documents that are deleted from this database are not only deleted but also overwritten with nonsense characters. This means that nobody with third party 'unerase' software will be able to read what was deleted on the hard-drive.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.SignatureHashingAlgorithm
member.summary: Gets or sets a haHashingAlgorithm enum value indicating the type of Signature Hashing Algorithm to be used for encrypting message digests. The values are 'haSha': Secure Hash Algorithm (default) or 'haMd5': Message Digest 5.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.SingleRequests
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether record can be requested by more than one user.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.SiteId
member.summary: Gets a string containing a unique identifier for the customer site which this database belongs to.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.StartOfDay
member.summary: Gets or sets an integer containing the number of seconds since midnight indicating the time the working day usually starts. This is used to calculate the timing of Record Action Tracking and Workflows.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.StatisticsDst
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether to adjust the statisticsTimeZone for daylight saving changes

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.StatisticsTimeZone
member.summary: Gets or sets a string value indicating the time zone to be used when calculating time based statistics.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.StorageHashCheck
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether Content Manager should perform a hash check to verify the safe transfer of documents from the workgroup to the final storage destination

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.StoreAutoClassifyNotes
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether auto-classification details are being stored on the notes of a record

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.StoreDocumentHashes
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether document hashes should be stored for latest document revisions

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.SupportsGIS
member.summary: Gets a Boolean indicating whether this dataset supports storing and indexing GIS co-ordinates for records and locations.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.SuppressDocumentExtractLogging
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean indicating whether document extract requests should be logged. This is useful for synchronization programs such as the CFS connector and requires the RecordAdminRestricted permission.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.SuppressWarningsForClosedContainers
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean parameter indicating whether to suppress warning when users put records into closed containers.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.SurnamePrefixNotInSort
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether a location's last name prefix will not impact its sort order. That is, if true, a location with Surname 'van Garderen' will be sorted by 'G' rather than 'v'. If false, the location will be sorted under 'v'.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.SynchCopyOwnerAccessControls
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean parameter indicating that if the record owner is changed, any access controls that have a default of 'copy from owner' should be updated

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.TNAcompliant
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether certain features of Content Manager should work in compliance with the UK National Archives standard.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.TransferHashCheck
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether Content Manager should perform a hash check to verify the safe transfer of documents from a client to a server

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.UdfThreshold
member.summary: Gets or sets the additional page display threshold to switch between the 2 modes when display additional fields

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.UnambiguousDateDisplay
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether the dates should be displayed in reports with unambiguous day/month value

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.UnknownLocationTypeValidation
member.summary: Gets or sets a GeneralExceptionHandling enum value indicating how to deal with unknown location types when verifying new record data entry forms that contain auto profiled contacts

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.UpdateCommentsAreMandatory
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether audit comments are mandatory whgen using the update comment facility

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.UpdateRecordNumberOnChangeOfClassification
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean indicating whether to update the record number when the record's classification is changed

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.UseClientDocumentCache
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value to determine whether Content Manager clients will cache any documents added or extracted to Content Manager. The client cache can speed up operations in many desktop editing situations.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.UseServerDocumentCache
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value to determine whether SDK=based service applications will cache any documents added or extracted from the dataset.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.UsingIDOLConnector
member.summary: Gets a boolean indicating whether and IDOL CFS Connector is running against this dataset.document extract requests should be logged. This is useful for synchronization programs such as the CFS connector and requires the RecordAdminRestricted permission.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.UsingSQLTextIndexing
member.summary: Gets a Boolean indicating whether this dataset supports SQL Text indexing for word-based metadata searching.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.VersUriPrefix
member.summary: Gets or sets a URL prefix used for converting a record identifier into a VEO URI when creating a VERS 3 compliant VEO

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.WarnIfContainerIsACopy
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean indicating whether to display a warning message if specifying a new container for a record and the new container is a copy.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.WarnIfContainerIsSuperseded
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean indicating whether to display a warning message if specifying a new container for a record and the new container is superseded.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.WarnWhenChangeDispositionOfRelated
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether a warning should be displayed upon removing or changing the disposition of a record if it is related to other records.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.WebServerURL
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the URL (Universal Resource Locator) where the Web Server or this database may be found, if a Context ICE Server is being used.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.WebServiceCache
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether web service applications should provide a fast access cache for each thread.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.WebServiceUnlimitedGlobalCache
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether web service applications allow the global object cache to grow forever.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.WorkgroupServerName
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the name of the Workgroup Server on which this database will be found. This property is only used when making an connection - if the database is already connected, it will have no effect.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.WorkgroupServerPort
member.summary: Gets or sets a number value to indicate which RCF port to use to connect to the nominated Content Manager Workgroup Server. Note that this will only be used if you specify a value for workgroupServerName.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.WorkgroupServerURL
member.summary: Gets or sets the URL used to connect to the Content Manager Workgroup Server. The URL is in the format {protocol}://{machine}:{port}. Protocol and port components are optional and will default to TCP and 1137, respectively.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Database.IsOwningReference
member.summary: Returns true if the Database object is an owning reference. Owning references must be manually disposed, by calling Dispose (). If the Database object is not an owning reference, the object can be safely discarded without calling Dispose ().

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Database.#ctor
member.summary: Default constructor for the Trim Database object

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Database.Connect
member.summary: Establishes a connection to a particular TRIM database for the given user.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Database.Disconnect
member.summary: Disconnects the current user from the SDK server. Call this function when the database connection is no longer required, to decrease the reference count. When all user references have been removed, the SDK server will shut down

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Database.SaveCaptions
member.summary: Any changes made to the default captions for objects and properties are held in memory. This method will make these changes permanent and apply them to all users of this database.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Database.IsModuleLicensed(TRIM.SDK.LicenseTypes)
member.summary: Determines if the specified module is in the current TRIM license - see also IsProductFeatureLicenced, IsProductFeatureActivated.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Database.IsProductFeatureLicensed(TRIM.SDK.ProductFeatures)
member.summary: Determines if the specified TRIM product feature is licensed in this TRIM installation.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Database.IsProductFeatureActivated(TRIM.SDK.ProductFeatures)
member.summary: Determines if the specified TRIM product feature has been activated in this TRIM installation.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Database.SetTimezone(System.Int32)
member.summary: Primarily used by a service program satisfying a remote client. Allows you to specify a different timezone to the timezone on the machine that is running the SDK. Consider using the SetTimezoneString function instead, as it supports daylight saving

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Database.GetTimezone
member.summary: Primarily used by a service program satisfying a remote client. Allows you to see the timezone that has been set on the database - this may be different to the timezone of the machine that is running the SDK.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Database.SetTimezoneString(System.String)
member.summary: Primarily used by a service program satisfying a remote client. Allows you to specify a different timezone to the timezone on the machine that is running the SDK. Uses the standard windows timezone string to specify a timezone, which supports daylight saving times, and is therefore preferable to using the basic GMT offset approach.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Database.GetTimezoneString
member.summary: Primarily used by a service program satisfying a remote client. Allows you to see the timezone that has been set on the database - this may be different to the timezone of the machine that is running the SDK.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Database.SetTimezone(System.TimeZoneInfo)
member.summary: Primarily used by a service program satisfying a remote client. Allows you to specify a different timezone to the timezone on the machine that is running the SDK. Need to have called SetAsService or SetAsWebService prior to calling this function.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Database.SetStrictRecordNumbers(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Turns off the TRIM feature that finds the first part of a container, if the part suffix was not specified. For example if the feature is not turned off, passing the record number 'G05/1' to the GetRecord method will also look for the record 'G05/1-01' if no record 'G05/1' exists.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Database.SetClassificationTopLevelNumbering(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Allows you to set the numbering pattern and last number for the numbering of top level classification

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Database.BeginTrans(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a broader user-defined transaction allowing you to co-ordinate the saving of a number of TRIM objects. This transaction must execute either a CommitTrans or RollbackTrans before the database can be closed.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Database.CommitTrans
member.summary: Commits the current user-defined transaction as created using the BeginTrans method.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Database.RollbackTrans
member.summary: Rolls out changes done within the current user-defined transaction as created by the BeginTrans method.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Database.SpawnImpersonatedDatabase(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a copy of the this database that simulates a login by a different user

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Database.GetTRIMFolder(TRIM.SDK.TrimPathType,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets the name of the nominated TRIM special folder

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Database.GetTRIMFileName(TRIM.SDK.TrimPathType,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets the name of the nominated TRIM special folder

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Database.RunEventStatistics(System.String,TRIM.SDK.TrimDateTime,TRIM.SDK.TrimDateTime,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates an output file (.html or .csv) containing statistics related to events recieved by the TRIM event processor

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Database.RunRecordCreationStatistics(System.String,TRIM.SDK.TrimDateTime,TRIM.SDK.TrimDateTime,TRIM.SDK.PrimaryRecordStatisticsGrouping,TRIM.SDK.LocationGrouping,TRIM.SDK.StatisticalDateRangeTypes,System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: Creates an output file (.html or .csv) containing statistics related to how many records were created divided into specified sub-categories

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Database.RefreshCache
member.summary: Clears the entire TRIM object cache, for this dataset.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Database.RefreshCache(TRIM.SDK.BaseObjectTypes,TRIM.SDK.TrimURI)
member.summary: Clears the object of the nominated uri and object type from the cache. If a 0 is passed for the uri parameter, all objects of the type specified are cleared from the cache. If Unknown is passed for objectType, the entire cache is cleared.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Database.EnsureCachedItemIsCurrent(TRIM.SDK.BaseObjectTypes,TRIM.SDK.TrimURI)
member.summary: Checks the object cache to ensure that the nominated object in the cache is current with the latest updated copy of the object committed to the database. If you run into regular object contention problems you might wish to do this prior to commencing an update transaction.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Database.Save
member.summary: Permanently commits all changes made to this database properties.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.AllowAccessFromMultipleThreads
member.summary: Indicates whether the developer has provided thread protection such that calls can be made to a database object from a different thread to that which created it.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.UsingInternetContentSearchStyle
member.summary: Indicates whether the content search string format is the ISYS 'Internet Style' or the older format ISYS search.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Database.LogExternalEvent(System.String,TRIM.SDK.BaseObjectTypes,TRIM.SDK.TrimURI,System.Boolean)
member.summary: This function allows you to create an external event which will be passed through to the event processor. An option also exists to make the retrieve the label that represents one of the special type of "Favorites" currently available for Records.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.TrustedUser
member.summary: Instruct TRIM to connect using the supplied user name, rather than the user name of the currently logged in process. This will fail if the connection is not being made by a trusted account name in the TRIM network (see TRIM Enterprise Studio - Miscellaneous).

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.ClientIPConnectionType
member.summary: Gets an IpConnectionType enum value indicating how the client is connecting to the machine running the SDK

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.ClientIPAddress
member.summary: Gets or sets the IP address of the client machine that this database is servicing. This is only relevant for web applications where the connection is being made from a remote browser. This IP address is available in audit logs - web browser developers should set this for a more comprehensive audit trail.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.IsSingleHopClient
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating that the SDK connection is being made from the same machine that is running the client application. Basically, a thick client.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.AuthenticationMethod
member.summary: Gets or sets the authentication method to be used when making the database connection

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Database.SetAuthenticationCredentials(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Provides credentials for use with the specified Authentication method. May be used with the ExplicitWindows and OpenId authentication methods. When used with OpenId authentication, this method allows non-interactive applications to authenticate using OpenID Connect confidential clients, configured in Content Manager Enterprise Studio. To authenticate using an OpenID Connect confidential client, Database.TrustedUser must be set, and the Client ID and Client Secret of the confidential client must be passed in as 'userName' and 'password', respectively.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Database.IsAuthenticationMethodSupported(System.String,TRIM.SDK.ClientAuthenticationMechanism)
member.summary: Provides an indication of whether the specified authentication method is supported. It is based on the information returned from the workgroup server at the time of the last connection.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Database.GetDefaultRecordSearchForm
member.summary: Gets an XML-formatted string representing the definition of the search form to be used by the current user when searching for records using the TRIM Web Client

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Database.GetDefaultSearchForm(TRIM.SDK.BaseObjectTypes)
member.summary: Gets an XML-formatted string representing the definition of the search form to be used by the current user when searching using the TRIM Web Client

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Database.GetAppConfig(System.String)
member.summary: Gets an XML string which represents the configuration setting of the nominated application

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Database.SetAppConfig(System.String,System.String)

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Database.GetUserAppConfig(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a string which represents the current user's preferences for the nominated application

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Database.SetUserAppConfig(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Sets an XML string which represents the current user's preferences for the nominated application

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Database.GetDefaultUserAppConfig(System.String)

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Database.SetDefaultUserAppConfig(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Sets an XML string which represents the default user preferences for the nominated application

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.DateUserKeyStateChanged
member.summary: Gets the date that the most recent change to the system was made that affects the state of the user record access keys.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.DateIdolMetadataSchemaChanged
member.summary: Gets the date that the most recent change to the system was made that affects the IDOL metadata schema.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Database.NewTrimObject(TRIM.SDK.BaseObjectTypes)

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Database.FindTrimObjectByUri(TRIM.SDK.BaseObjectTypes,System.Int64)
member.summary: Finds a TrimMainObject of the nominated type and uri.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Database.FindTrimObjectByName(TRIM.SDK.BaseObjectTypes,System.String)
member.summary: Finds a TrimMainObject of the nominated type and uri.

member.summary: Gets the nominated UserOptionSet for the currently logged in user.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Database.UnescapeString(System.String,System.Boolean)

You would use this in, say, an event processing add-in environment where you want to tidy up newly created or updated records but still allow users to search by LastUpdatedBy. Note that LastUpdatedOn is incremented by one second to preserve the transaction logic.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Database.UseWorkgroupPendingFolder
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean indicating whether document storage operations using the asynchronous pending folder on the workgroup server. Using the pending folder may speed up response times in some user interface scenarios, however it is not recommended when running intensive server side document updates. If you wish to guarantee safe delivery of the document, it is also recommended to not use the pending folder. Note also, the Pending Folder can only be used if it is configired for the workgroup.

member.name: T:TRIM.SDK.DatabaseConnectionPool
member.summary:
Provides configuration of the global database connection pool. Because the database connection pool is global, only a single instance of the DatabaseConnectionPool class may be created.
The global database connection pool allows you to reuse network connections across multiple Database objects. Calling Database.Connect() is a relatively expensive operation, especially in applications that create a potentially large number of Database objects. The database connection pool optimizes this by caching network connections and reusing them in subsequent Database.Connect() calls. When a Database object is disposed, the connection is automatically returned to the database connection pool.
Connection pooling operates transparently, but only applies for Database objects for which the Id, WorkgroupServerName and TrustedUser properties have been set. Note that all three of these properties must be set, for connection pooling to be enabled.
The DatabaseConnectionPool class implements the IDisposable interface. DatabaseConnectionPool objects must be properly disposed by your program, either by calling Dispose () in a 'finally' clause, or with a 'using' clause.

member.summary: Constructs an instance of the DatabaseConnectionPool class.

member.summary: Constructs an instance of the DatabaseConnectionPool class, with the specified maximum connection limit.

member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum allowed time (in seconds) that a database connection may remain idle in the pool. The time is measured from the point when the database connection was last returned to the pool.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.DatabaseConnectionPool.MaxConnectionCount
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of connections allowed in the pool.

member.summary: Gets the current number of idle connections in the pool.

member.summary: Gets the current number of busy connections in the pool.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.DatabaseConnectionPool.Flush
member.summary: Clears all idle connections from the pool.

members.member: Note that the IEnumerator documentation requires an InvalidOperationException to be thrown whenever the collection is modified. This has been done for changes in the size of the collection but not when one of the elements of the collection is modified as it is a bit tricky to detect unmanaged code that modifies the collection under our feet.

If false, the entry form may still be displayed, if there are mandatory data entry fields for the record that are not able to be populated by details of the document; if not, then it will be bypassed.

This will have the effect of ignoring any documents that have not been cataloged in Content Manager.

member.name: T:TRIM.SDK.DocumentStoreIncrementalCheckTask
member.summary: The DocumentStoreIncrementalCheckTask class is designed to be run periodically against new additions to the document store. It is a report-only tool and flags any errors that may have occurred recently in the store. If errors are detected, you can run the DocumentStoreIntegrityCheckTask to correct them.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.DocumentStoreIncrementalCheckTask.StoreBeingChecked
member.summary: Gets the document store that is currently being checked

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.DocumentStoreIncrementalCheckTask.TreatPendingAsMissing
member.summary: This property allows you to tell the incremental checker to treat any documents pending asynchronous transfer from the client to the workgroup as missing.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.DocumentStoreIncrementalCheckTask.LogPath
member.summary: This property allows you to set the path for the log file generated by this run.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.DocumentStoreIncrementalCheckTask.OnlyLogErrors
member.summary: This property allows you to set whether to only log errors in the log file. By default, all activity will be logged.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.DocumentStoreIncrementalCheckTask.SetDateModifiedRange(TRIM.SDK.SearchTimePeriodPlural,System.Int32)
member.summary: Allows you to set the range of modified dates for the objects to be incrementally checked

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.DocumentStoreIncrementalCheckTask.QuantityOfTimePeriods
member.summary: Gets the number of time periods to use to formulate the dateModified range

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.DocumentStoreIncrementalCheckTask.TimePeriod
member.summary: Gets the time period to use to formulate the dateModified range

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.DocumentStoreIncrementalCheckTask.DoRecords
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether stored documents representing the current document of a record should be checked

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.DocumentStoreIncrementalCheckTask.DoRevisions
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether stored documents representing a previous revision of a record should be checked

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.DocumentStoreIncrementalCheckTask.DoRenditions
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether stored documents representing a rendition of a record should be checked

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.DocumentStoreIncrementalCheckTask.DetailedCheck
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether to do a comprehensive detailed check or just a simple check for existence

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.DocumentStoreIncrementalCheckTask.BufferSize
member.summary: Gets or sets a number value representing the buffer size used when processing a set of store references. Used when multi-threaded and also determines how often to save restart data

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.DocumentStoreIncrementalCheckTask.NumberOfThreads
member.summary: Gets or sets a number value indicating how many threads should be used for processing. If you specify 0 then the task will run in single threaded mode.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.DocumentStoreIncrementalCheckTask.ThreadTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets a number value indicating the timeout value (in seconds) being used for thread processing. A thread needs to complete a single operations within this time frame.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.DocumentStoreIncrementalCheckTask.Run
member.summary: Runs the store integrity checker using the supplied parameters. The process is run asynchronously and you can monitor progress by examining the Status property and any of the processing counter properties. If you destroy this task before the run is complete then it will work in a similar way to as if you executed the Cancel function.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.DocumentStoreIncrementalCheckTask.Cancel
member.summary: If you have started the asynchronous integrity check by calling the Run() function, then you can cancel it using this method.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.DocumentStoreIncrementalCheckTask.ErrorMessage
member.summary: Gets the current status of the asynchronous integrity check run. Gets the error message returned from processing if the status was Failed

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.DocumentStoreIncrementalCheckTask.GetProgressCounter(TRIM.SDK.DocumentStoreIntegrityCheckCounter)
member.summary: Get the progress counter for the passed in DocumentStoreIntegrityCheckCounter enum.

member.summary: Gets or sets a sstring value to specify a windows folder that contains a backup of the document store from some time in the past. When correcting a missing or corrupt file situation, the integrity checker will see if there is a better copy of this document within the backup store. Only works for Windows File System stores.

member.summary: Gets or sets a ElectronicStore value that will be used if any new documents need to be added to the system as part of integrity check processing. By default, the store that is being checked will be used unless you specify an alternative. You need to specify an alternative if you provide a backup path and the store that is being checked is locked for further updates.

member.name: T:TRIM.SDK.ElectronicStore
member.summary: Defines settings for a place to store electronic documents

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ElectronicStore.AlertLevel
member.summary: Gets or sets an integer indicating the percentage of total capacity at which users should be alerted of the storage level reached.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ElectronicStore.AutnGroup
member.summary: Gets or sets a string value indicating the AUTN_GROUP property for a IDOL CFS Connector based store. This allows a Content Manager store to use distributed IDOL CFS

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ElectronicStore.BackupPool
member.summary: Gets or sets an Electronic Store Pool object indicating the store pool to use for keeping backups of managed in place documents.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ElectronicStore.BackupStore
member.summary: Gets or sets an Electronic Store object indicating the store to use for keeping backups of managed in place documents.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ElectronicStore.BytesRemaining
member.summary: Gets a number value indicating the actual amount of space currently availablefor this store.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ElectronicStore.BytesUsed
member.summary: Gets a number value indicating the actual amount of space currently used for this store.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ElectronicStore.Capacity
member.summary: Gets or sets an integer containing the maximum capacity of the Document Store (bytes).

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ElectronicStore.Compress
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether items to be stored in this document store should be compressed.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ElectronicStore.DefaultAccessDate
member.summary: Gets or sets a datetime value which is used as the lastAccessedDate for an item if there is no other record of a last accessed date. Used when access date logging has been implemented part way through a store implementation, also when not logging access dates during the add operation.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ElectronicStore.DeleteRetriesQueued
member.summary: Gets a number indicating the number of delete requests that have not yet been successfully processed.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ElectronicStore.DeploymentStatus
member.summary: Gets or sets a storeStatus enum value to indicate the availability of this document store.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ElectronicStore.Encrypt
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether items to be stored in this document store should be encrypted.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ElectronicStore.ExternalConfig
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing configuration information for an external store.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ElectronicStore.ExternalProgId
member.summary: Gets or sets a COM ProgID for the external store component.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ElectronicStore.FilesPerFolder
member.summary: Gets or sets an integer containing the maximum number of files per subdirectory in the store. A new subdirectory within the store will be created when this maximum is reached. Setting the value of this property will automatically set the ElectronicStore.MaxMBsInDir property to '0'.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ElectronicStore.InPool
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value to indicate whether this store in part of the default storage pool.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ElectronicStore.IsManagedInPlace
member.summary: Gets a boolean value indicating whether this store implements a 'manage in place' approach for document storage. In this case only a reference is stored.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ElectronicStore.ItemFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets a ItemStorageSystem enumerated value to indicate what system is used to store the externally managed items in this store. Only applies to External DMS (Manage In Place) stores.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ElectronicStore.KeepAccessDates
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether a last accessed date should be maintained for documents held within this store.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ElectronicStore.KeepBackups
member.summary: Gets a boolean value indicating if a backup copy of a managed in place item should be kept by Content Manager.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ElectronicStore.LoginName
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the user name for connecting, if the store requires connection credentials.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ElectronicStore.LoginPassword
member.summary: Sets a string containing the password used when connecting, if the store requires connection credentials.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ElectronicStore.MaxFolderSize
member.summary: Gets or sets an number indicating the maximum size of each subdirectory in the store, in bytes. A new subdirectory within the store will be created when this maximum is reached.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ElectronicStore.MipScanInterval
member.summary: Gets or sets a number that represents the interval a scan will be performed by the Event Processor. (0 - indicates never scan)

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ElectronicStore.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the name of this Document Store.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ElectronicStore.NotifyHolds
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether this store should be notified whenever a hold is added or removed from a record.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ElectronicStore.NotifyMetadata
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether this store should receive important metadata updates.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ElectronicStore.Path
member.summary: Gets a string containing the full path to the directory where this Document Store is located. The electronic documents are kept in subdirectories of this location. A string containing the path to the base directory of the Document Store is held in the ElectronicStore.DbPath property.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ElectronicStore.Pool
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value to indicate whether this store in part of the specified storage pool.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ElectronicStore.SecCompliant
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether this store implements SEC compliance rules.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ElectronicStore.StorageTier
member.summary: Gets or sets a TieredStorageType enumeration value indicating the storage tier that this document store belongs to.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ElectronicStore.StoreLocation
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the path to the base directory within which the subdirectory named after the database id which in turn contains the folder for this Document Store is located. The electronic documents are kept in subdirectories of the document store folder. Note: If connected to a network, this string must be set to the string path of a a network share. If not connected to a network, a local path must be used.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ElectronicStore.StoreType
member.summary: Gets an esEstoreTypes enum value indicating what type of document store it is.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ElectronicStore.UpdateAccessDateOnAdd
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether a last accessed date should be set for a document at the time the document is added to this store.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ElectronicStore.WgsAffinity
member.summary: Gets or sets a string value containing a comma-separated list of workgroup server ID's, for which this store has affinity.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ElectronicStore.WriteProtected
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether this Document Store should be designated read only. Use the DeploymentStatus property for version 7.2 or later.

member.name: T:TRIM.SDK.EventMonitor
member.summary: Class to allow SDK clients to monitor the progress of Event processors.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.EventMonitor.#ctor(TRIM.SDK.Database,System.Int32)
member.summary: Setup an ApiEventMonitor object with a current database handle and a timer value in milliseconds that regulates how often counter data is checked for. The database handle should have 'AllowAccessFromMultipleThreads' set to true, otherwise it will attempt to enabled it.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.EventMonitor.GetAvailableProcessors
member.summary: Gets a list of event processor types that can be polled for counters. Only those event processors that are enabled, or in a suspended state will be returned. Any event processors that are disabled will be omitted from the list.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.EventMonitor.Initialise
member.summary: Initialise the session prior to setting up the event processors we want to gather data on. This returns a GUID or token which uniquely identifies this session. A session will have a limited lifetime. The token is used to gather data for as long as the session is alive. Once the session has expired, this method must be called again to generate a new token. The token can be stored externally and used to revitalise sessions between invocations of ApiEventMonitor objects (see SetToken()). Will return an empty string if it fails.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.EventMonitor.Initialise(TRIM.SDK.EventProcessTypeList)
member.summary: If an existing token is passed to Initialise() as an argument, and the object belonging to the token still exists, the session can continue, otherwise a new monitor object will be initialised and the new token will be returned.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.EventMonitor.Token
member.summary: Get the current token for this session. The value can be saved and used at a later date to revitalise sessions if they are still running on the remote server.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.EventMonitor.setToken(System.String)
member.summary: If a previous token has been saved, use this method to re-initialise the session. If the session is still alive on the remote server, returns true. It is not necessary to call Initialise() if this method returns true.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.EventMonitor.EnableCounters
member.summary: Enable all the available event processors for data gathering. An available event processor is one that is active, or in the suspended state. Disabled event processors are ignored.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.EventMonitor.EnableCounters(TRIM.SDK.EventProcessType)
member.summary: Enable the specific event processor for data gathering. The processor type must be enabled on the remote server, otherwise a false value will be returned

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.EventMonitor.EnableCounters(TRIM.SDK.EventProcessTypeList)
member.summary: Enable the list of event processors for data gathering. All the processor types must be enabled on the remote server, otherwise a false value will be returned

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.EventMonitor.GetEnabledCounters
member.summary: Return the list of event processors that have data gathering enabled

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.EventMonitor.DisableCounters
member.summary: Disable all event processors that are currently enabled. Returns true if any counters were disabled

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.EventMonitor.DisableCounters(TRIM.SDK.EventProcessType)
member.summary: Disable the event processor type supplied. Returns true if successful

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.EventMonitor.DisableCounters(TRIM.SDK.EventProcessTypeList)
member.summary: Disable the list of event processors supplied. Returns true if all were successfully disabled

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.EventMonitor.IsAlive
member.summary: Determines if the Event Monitor object on the server is still viable based on the token for this object. If the workgroup server is restarted, then the current token will be invalid and this method will return false. It is then necessary to reinitialise the session using Initialise() which will return a new token. This method should be called prior to calling GetResults()..

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.EventMonitor.GetResults(TRIM.SDK.EventProcessType)
member.summary: Return the locally cached counters of results from the last poll of the workgroup server. A call to GetResults() should always be preceded by a call to IsAlive() to ensure that the remote Event Monitor Object is still active, otherwise no results will be available.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.EventMonitor.setRefreshInterval(System.Int32)
member.summary: Set the interval (in milliseconds) between polling for new counter values. There is a strict minimum value of 1000 milliseconds which overrides the value passed in, as well as the registry setting for the minimum which can be configured by administrators. If the registry value has been set, then this will override the value of the argument value (if it is less than the registry value).

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.EventMonitor.RefreshInterval
member.summary: Get the value of the refresh interval (in milliseconds)

member.summary: The type of event processor under consideration

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.EventProcessorCounters.ProcessorStatus
member.summary: The status of the event processor (suspended or active)

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.EventProcessorCounters.QueuedEvents
member.summary: Get the number of events that are currently in the queue.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.EventProcessorCounters.ProcessedEvents
member.summary: Get the number of events that have been successfully processed

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.EventProcessorCounters.FailedEvents
member.summary: Get the number of failed events

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.EventProcessorCounters.TimerEvents
member.summary: Get the number of timer events

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.EventProcessorCounters.TimerFailedEvents
member.summary: Get the number of timer events that have failed

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.EventProcessorCounters.LastError
member.summary: Get any error that is currently blocking the processing of events.

member.summary: Definition of an external workflow system or template, used to record shared details for a set of specific external workflow instances

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ExternalWorkflowType.AutoInitiate
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether a workflow of this type should be automatically initiated whenever a record of the InitiatingRecordType is created.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ExternalWorkflowType.CaseRecordType
member.summary: Gets or sets a record type which will be used when creating the case record for workflows of this type

member.summary: Gets or sets a Record object representing the container that should be used to enclose any case records created for workflows of this type.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ExternalWorkflowType.DocumentRecordType
member.summary: Gets or sets a record type which will be used when adding documents to the case record for workflows of this type

member.summary: Gets or sets a string variable representing the host id of the external workgroup service data set.
