member.summary: Gets or sets an Icons enumeration value to associate a standard Content Manager icon with this external workflow type.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ExternalWorkflowType.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets a string representing the id for this type of external workflow

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ExternalWorkflowType.InitiatingRecordType
member.summary: Gets or sets a record type indicating which records will have the option to initiate a new workflow of this type

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ExternalWorkflowType.LaunchURL
member.summary: Gets or sets a string value defining a Web Service URL that is used to launch a new workflow of this type.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ExternalWorkflowType.LaunchURLForDetails
member.summary: Gets or sets a string value defining a Web Service URL that is used to display details of an external workflow. There should be a placeholder string within the URL (%%SLIPID%%) to indicate where Content Manager should substitute the slipId of the workflow.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ExternalWorkflowType.LaunchURLForTaskDetails
member.summary: Gets or sets a string value defining a Web Service URL that is used to display details of a currently open task within an external workflow. There should be a placeholder strings within the URL (%%SLIPID%% and %%TASKID%%) to indicate where Content Manager should substitute the slipId and or taskId of the workflow task.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ExternalWorkflowType.LaunchURLWithRecord
member.summary: Gets or sets a string value defining a Web Service URL that is used to initiate a new workflow of this type. This format is used when passing through details of the initiating record. There should be a placeholder string within the URL (%%RECORD%%) to indicate where Content Manager should substitute the uri of the initiating record.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ExternalWorkflowType.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets a string representing the name for this type of external workflow

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ExternalWorkflowType.NeedsInitiatingRecord
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether a workflow of this type can only be created with an initiating record.

member.name: T:TRIM.SDK.ExtractDocument
member.summary: A helper class that encapsulates the process of extracting a document attached to a Trim object.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ExtractDocument.FileName
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the file name to be given to the document of this Extract Document when extracted. The directory to which it should be extracted is passed as a parameter of the 'DoExtract' method.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ExtractDocument.FileType
member.summary: Gets a string containing the file extension of the electronic document corresponding to this ExtractDocument object.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ExtractDocument.FileSize
member.summary: Gets an integer containing the size of the electronic document corresponding to this ExtractDocument in bytes.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ExtractDocument.FileDateTimeModified
member.summary: Gets the date and time the electronic document corresponding to this ExtractDocument was last modified.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ExtractDocument.ForWebBrowserViewing
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether extracting this ExtractDocument will retrieve a 'browser friendly' version. That is, whether it is the type of document that may be viewed within a web browser.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ExtractDocument.ConvertToHTML
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether to convert the document to HTML

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ExtractDocument.HasOleLinks
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether the electronic document corresponding to this Extract Document contains OLE links to other documents.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ExtractDocument.ConvertToZipIfHasOleLinks
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether the electronic document should be converted to ZIP format if it contains OLE links to other documents.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ExtractDocument.IsTRIMMail
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether the electronic document corresponding to this Extract Document is a TRIM mail message

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ExtractDocument.CheckoutAs
member.summary: Gets or sets a string that will be remembered by Content Manager as the checkout path of the electronic document.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ExtractDocument.HighlightWords
member.summary: Gets or sets a string which contains a specification of which words to highlight when preparing an HTML format. The string is a comma delimited list of words.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ExtractDocument.HighlightForegroundColour
member.summary: Gets or sets the value of the foreground colour used to highlight words. The value should be a hexadecimal representation of the standard RGB values used in HTML markup. For example, the colour red would be FF0000 and black would be 000000.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ExtractDocument.HighlightBackgroundColour
member.summary: Gets or sets the value of the background colour used to highlight words. The value should be a hexadecimal representation of the standard RGB values used in HTML markup. For example, the colour red would be FF0000 and black would be 000000.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ExtractDocument.HTMLHeader
member.summary: Gets or sets a string which contains HTML that will be placed at the start of the HTML file created when using the ConvertToHTML/ForWebBrowserViewing options.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ExtractDocument.HTMLFooter
member.summary: Gets or sets a string which contains HTML that will be placed at the end of the HTML file created when using the ConvertToHTML/ForWebBrowserViewing options.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ExtractDocument.SuppressLastAction
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean property which indicates that the extract operation should not update the LastActionDate of a record.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ExtractDocument.LogAsViewed
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean property which indicates that the extract operation should log in the audit log as a "Document Viewed" event not a "Document Extracted" event.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ExtractDocument.EnableOCRWhileConvertingToHTML
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean property which indicates that whether the extract operation should eanable OCR feature while converting to HTML.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.ExtractDocument.DoExtract(System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: Extracts the document to the specified windows folder, giving it the name as specified by the FileName property. If the FileName property is blank, a temporary file will be created. After extraction, the FileName property will be updated to contained the full file name of the extracted file.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.FavoriteSearchMethodsUserOptions.#ctor(TRIM.SDK.Database)
member.summary: Constructor for the FavoriteSearchMethodsUserOptions option set.

member.name: T:TRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition
member.summary: Defines characteristics of a user-defined metadata element that can be used to supplement standard Content Manager data elements for some objects

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.Abbreviation
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing an abbreviation for the user field corresponding to this FieldDefinition object.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.AllowInactiveObjects
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean property indicating whether this field can be set to an object that is determoned to be 'Inactive'. Currently applies to field of type Location.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.AllowNegative
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean property indicating whether numeric values are allowed to be negative (number, big number, currency and decimal formats only).

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.AllowUpdateForDestroyed
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean property indicating whether the value of this field can be modified on a record that has been destroyed.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.CurrencySymbol
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the currency symbol to be used for fields of type currency. Leave blank to use the default currency symbol of the dataset.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.DateTimeIsUTC
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether date time values should be entered, displayed and searched as if they are UTC values rather than local time.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.DecimalPlaces
member.summary: Gets or sets a number corresponding to the number of decimal places to display when displaying this field (currency and decimal formats only, between 0 and 8).

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.DefaultBoolean
member.summary: Gets the default boolean value for this user field, if it is a boolean user field. This FieldDefinition object is a boolean user field if the property FieldDefinition.Format has the value 'ufBoolean'.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.DefaultCurrency
member.summary: Gets the default currency value for this user field, if it is a currency user field. This FieldDefinition object is a currency user field if the property FieldDefinition.Format has the value 'ufCurrency'.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.DefaultDate
member.summary: Gets the default date or datetime value for this user field, if it is a date or datetime user field. This FieldDefinition object is an date user field if the property FieldDefinition.Format has the value 'ufDate', and a datetime user field if FieldDefinition.Format has the value 'ufDateTime'.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.DefaultDecimal
member.summary: Gets the default decimal value for this user field, if it is a decimal user field. This FieldDefinition object is a decimal user field if the property FieldDefinition.Format has the value 'ufDecimal'.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.DefaultDisplay
member.summary: Gets a string representation of the default value of the user field corresponding to this FieldDefinition object in a format that is suitable for display purposes, e.g. with leading zeroes cut off.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.DefaultInternal
member.summary: Gets a string representation of the default value of the user field corresponding to this FieldDefinition object in the same format as it is stored in the database.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.DefaultNumber
member.summary: Gets the default integer value for this user field, if it is an integer user field. This FieldDefinition object is an integer user field if the property FieldDefinition.Format has the value 'ufNumber'.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.DefaultString
member.summary: Gets the default string value for this user field, if it is a string or text user field. This FieldDefinition object is a string user field if the property FieldDefinition.Format has the value 'ufString', and a text user field if FieldDefinition.Format has the value 'ufText'.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.ExternalId
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the External Identification Number for the user field corresponding to this FieldDefinition object. This identifier cannot be changed through the Content Manager user interface and so guarantees your program a reliable handle to the user field aside from the URI.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.ForceSpellCheck
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating that when entering a value for this field, the spelling check function should be mandatory. Only applies to fields of format string using the simple verification type or fields of format text.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.Format
member.summary: Gets or sets a ufUserFieldFormats enum value indicating the format of the user field corresponding to this FieldDefinition object. The user field may be used to store boolean, currency, date, date and time, decimal, Content Manager object (currently restricted to Content Manager location), string or text values.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.HasNotes
member.summary: Gets a boolean value indicating whether there have been any notes attached to this additional field.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.IconId
member.summary: Gets or sets an Icons enumeration value to associate a standard Content Manager icon with this user field.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.InIDOLSchema
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean property indicating if this field should be included in the IDOL metadata schema when indexing records within IDOL.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.InIDOLtext
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether this user-defined field has been configured to include the value in the IDOL text indexing group.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.IsUsedBy
member.summary: Gets a string listing the objects using this user field in Content Manager. Does not include record types.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.IsUsedByRecordTypes
member.summary: Gets a string listing the record types using this user field in Content Manager.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.IsVisible
member.summary: Gets the visible state of this field for the current user.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.Length
member.summary: Gets or sets an integer containing the maximum number of characters allowed in this user field, if it is a string user field. The value of this property may not exceed 255 characters.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.LocationMustBeMemberOf
member.summary: Gets or sets a location object that this field must be a member of. Only applies to fields of format object and type location.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.LocationRestriction
member.summary: Gets or sets a Location Field Type enumeration value indicating, for a field of format 'object (location)', whether internal or external locations are suitable

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.LookupSet
member.summary: Gets or sets a LookupSet object used to contain a set of acceptable string values for this user field, if it is a string or text user field.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.LowerLimit
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the lower limit, or minimum value of this user field.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.Mask
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing an edit mask to be used for this user field, if this is a string user field. The mask is a combination of normal characters with the special characters 'N,A,X,Z,\'used to restrict the format of any string entered for this field. See the Content Manager Help File for more information on the edit mask format.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the name of the user field corresponding to this FieldDefinition object.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.ObjectType
member.summary: Gets or sets a BaseObjectTypes enum value indicating the Content Manager object type of the user field, if it is an object user field.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.OnlyLookupItemsInText
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating that when using a lookup set, the text can only contain lookup items and no additional text. Only applies to fields of format text.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.PluginBrowseOnly
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating that when entering a value for this field, the value cannot be typed bust must be selected using the KwikSelect key. Only applies to fields of format string using the addIn string verification type.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.PluginId
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the PROGID of an COM component implementing the validation function, if this is a string user field using a COM component for validation.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.RecordMustBeOfType
member.summary: Gets or sets a record type object that this field must have. Only applies to fields of format object and type record.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.SapKeySetField
member.summary: Gets or sets a string value that maps this user defined field to one of the fields in the SAP Keys extended metadata interface provided by the ArchiveLink Content Server.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.SearchClause
member.summary: Gets a string representing a user-specified clause name for this user field.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.SearchClauseCaption
member.summary: Gets a string representing a user-friendly version of the the search clause name used for this user field.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.SearchClauseName

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.SubstitutionString
member.summary: Gets a string value which can be used as a substitution string when encoding this field into a text expression, such as an external link paramater.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.SuppressFormatting
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean property indicating whether the display of field values for this field should suppress formatting. Currently only used to suppress the thousands separator for numbers.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.UpperLimit
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the upper limit, or maximum value of this user field.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.IsUsedFor(TRIM.SDK.TrimObject)
member.summary: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether this user defined field is used for the nominated TrimObject.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.IsUsedForAny(TRIM.SDK.BaseObjectTypes)
member.summary: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether this user defined field is used for the objects (or any subcategory of objects) of the nominated TRIM object type.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.SetIsUsedFor(TRIM.SDK.TrimObject,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Adds or removes this user field from the list of user fields for the nominated Base Object (and hence all other objects of the same type category). For example, if the nominated base object is an organization, then this method will set this user field's usage for all organization Locations.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.SetIsUsedFor(TRIM.SDK.BaseObjectTypes,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Adds or removes this user field from the list of user fields for the nominated Base Object Type. You cannot use this form to turn usage on for records or Locations, since these object types have a further condition that is used to determine if a field is applicable.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.FieldDefinition.SetIsUsedForWorkflowWithNoTemplate(System.Boolean)

members.member: Note that the IEnumerator documentation requires an InvalidOperationException to be thrown whenever the collection is modified. This has been done for changes in the size of the collection but not when one of the elements of the collection is modified as it is a bit tricky to detect unmanaged code that modifies the collection under our feet.

member.summary: Gets the URI of the target object of this event

member.summary: Gets an Events enum value indicating the type of audit event represented by this history object.

member.summary: Gets a boolean value indication if this event is a search execution event

member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether a security violation has been detected.

member.summary: Gets the Location object to which the event associated with this History object occurred.

member.summary: Gets a string containing the network login of the location by whom the audit event corresponding to this History object was performed.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.History.LoginLocation
member.summary: Gets the Location object by whom the audit event corresponding to this History object was performed.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.History.MovementLocation
member.summary: Gets the target Location of the event corresponding to this History event. For 'Assignee Changed', for example, this property holds the Location the record was moved to; for 'Contact Added', this property holds the contact Location that was added. If this event does not involve a target Location, for example, 'Document Removed', this property has a null value.

member.summary: Gets a string containing the event details text as provided by the SDK or by Content Manager when the event was generated.

member.summary: Gets the title of the record object to which the event associated with this History object occurred.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.History.RelatedObject
member.summary: Gets a string describing the related object for this event. the title of the record object to which the event associated with this History object occurred.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.History.RelatedObjectType
member.summary: Gets the type of the related object for this event. Many events have a primary affected object, together with a related object.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.History.RelatedObjectUri
member.summary: Gets the uri of the related object for this event. Many events have a primary affected object, together with a related object.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.History.SearchTitle
member.summary: Gets a string value describing the search that was executed (only for search execution events)

member.summary: Gets an text string that provides a detailed summary of the event - only applicable for the created/modified events

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.History.UpdateComments
member.summary: Gets a string value indicating any comments provided with the object modified event

member.summary: Gets the Workflow to which the event associated with this History object occurred.

member.summary: Gets a string value indicating the %R_workgroup% used to originate the event.

member.summary: Gets an XML-formatted string that provides a detailed summary of the event - only applicable for the created/modified events

member.summary: Gets the search assocated with this history event. It is only available for historical events that are associated with the execution of a search (IsSearch = true). Auditing of record searches needs to be enabled in the audit options page in order to see a history of record searches.

member.summary: Show Active Audit Event for object type

member.name: T:TRIM.SDK.Hold
member.summary: Describes a restriction that may be could be applied to one or more Records, usually related to ongoing legal action

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Hold.AffectsDispositionOnly
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether this Hold only affects disposition changes for the record. That is, when a Hold with this property set to true is applied to a record, a user may not change the disposition of the record, nor delete it or any attached electronic document. The record will be available for other modifications, however. If the property is set to false then only the assignee field can be changed for the period of the hold.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Hold.CanViewDetails
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether details of this Hold object can be viewed by the current user.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Hold.Contact
member.summary: Gets or sets a Location object which is the nominated contact location for the Hold.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Hold.ExternalId
member.summary: Gets or sets a string value indicating the name of an external system that has created this hold. External holds require special permissions to be removed from records.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Hold.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the name of this Hold object.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Hold.SearchCriteria
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing a record search string used to identify records selected for this hold..

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Hold.SearchLastRunOn
member.summary: Gets or sets a datetime which indicates when a search for records was last executed for this hold.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Hold.AddRecords(System.String)
member.summary: Adds a set of records to this hold. Provides an efficient way for adding multiple records to a hold. Returns the number of records that were added to the hold (the ErrorMessage property will contain an information message describing this in more detail).

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Hold.AddRecords(System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Adds a set of records to this hold. Provides an efficient way for adding multiple records to a hold. Returns the number of records that were added to the hold (the ErrorMessage property will contain an information message describing this in more detail). This version allows you to specify how the audit entries are generated.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Hold.RemoveRecords(System.String)
member.summary: Removes a set of records from this hold. Provides an efficient way for removing multiple records from a hold. Returns the number of records that were removed from the hold (the ErrorMessage property will contain an information message describing this in more detail).

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Hold.RemoveRecords(System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Removes a set of records from this hold. Provides an efficient way for removing multiple records from a hold. Returns the number of records that were removed from the hold (the ErrorMessage property will contain an information message describing this in more detail). This version allows you to specify how the audit entries are generated.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Hold.RemoveAllRecords
member.summary: Removes all records from this hold. Provides an efficient way for removing all records from a hold. Returns the number of records that were removed from the hold (the ErrorMessage property will contain an information message describing this in more detail).

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Hold.RemoveAllRecords(System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Removes all records from this hold. Provides an efficient way for removing all records from a hold. Returns the number of records that were removed from the hold (the ErrorMessage property will contain an information message describing this in more detail). This version allows you to specify how the audit entries are generated.

member.summary: Sets the Input Document to correspond to an item in an document storage system that is to be managed "in place". The externalId property will be used by Content Manager to provide a view of the document with the Content Manager user interface. The format of the externalId will be suitable for the type of Manage In Place store. For Windows File System, it is the path to the document (preferable UNC path).

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.InputDocument.SetAsOfflineRecord(TRIM.SDK.OfflineRecord,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets the InputDocument from an Offline Record

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.InputDocument.SetAsOneDriveDocument(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Sets the Input Document to be based on an OneDrive document. A record created from this InputDocument will be presumed to spend most of its lifecycle in OneDrive, relying on Microsoft functionality for such things as Checking out, sharing, etc Once the record has been created, you can access the OneDrive using the ExternalEditorId property, which will be look like DriveId/items/DriveItemId, eg b!UgiVBAllpkmHZy1DJVGavKL4VWza519CgBB5T4uRNiClblKr8Q-XQpi4vzQ1_eEt/items/01NBX3FBPHWTXGMIKRZZHIC2R7QCNELYV6

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.InputDocument.ContentId
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing a unique hash of the content of this document ( such as a OneDrive CTag).

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.InputDocument.VerificationHash
member.summary: Gets or sets a 64-byte MD5 hash of the document that can be used for end to end verification. When the document is submitted to the record this hash will be checked for validity, allowing an end-to-end verification mechanism to be established. For compatibility, you can calculated this hash using the Database.CalculateDocumentHash function.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.InputDocument.AddDocumentChunk(TRIM.SDK.Database,TRIM.SDK.ByteList,System.Int64)
member.summary: Upload a chunk of binary data via the workgroup server to allow the ServiceAPI to stream file chunks without first having to download a file to local storage.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.InputDocument.FinishUpload(TRIM.SDK.Database,TRIM.SDK.ElectronicStore)
member.summary: Signals that the file uploaded by chunks using AddDocumentChunk() is now complete and the document will be finalised by calling SetAsAlreadyStoredItem() internally.

members.member: Note that the IEnumerator documentation requires an InvalidOperationException to be thrown whenever the collection is modified. This has been done for changes in the size of the collection but not when one of the elements of the collection is modified as it is a bit tricky to detect unmanaged code that modifies the collection under our feet.

member.name: T:TRIM.SDK.ITrimAddInBase
member.summary: The TrimAddIn interface is defined so that SDK developers can develop a class that implements this interface. The class can then be registered with TRIM to support customising a number of elements of TRIM behavior. Note that your class must not require any constructor parameters.

member.name: T:TRIM.SDK.Jurisdiction
member.summary: A jurisdiction is a legal entity that has the power to compel an organization to retain its records in a particular manner

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Jurisdiction.Comments
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing comments for this Jurisdiction.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Jurisdiction.Description
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing a description of the Jurisdiction.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Jurisdiction.JurisdictionType
member.summary: Gets or sets a jurisdictionTypes enumeration value which determines what type of jurisidiction this is.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Jurisdiction.Members
member.summary: Gets or sets a string describing all of the member %bs_jurisdiction% of this %b_jurisdiction%.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Jurisdiction.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the abbreviation for this Jurisdiction

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Jurisdiction.ChildMembers
member.summary: Get the list of Member Jurisdictions

member.name: T:TRIM.SDK.JurisdictionMember
member.summary: Represents a Jurisdiction which is a member of the parent Jurisdiction

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.JurisdictionMember.Jurisdiction
member.summary: Gets the jurisdiction for the member of this group jurisdiction.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.JurisdictionMembers.getItem(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Gets the item in this child list at the nominated index.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.JurisdictionMembers.Parent
member.summary: Gets the parent object of this child object collection

member.name: F:TRIM.SDK.JurisdictionPurposes.ScheduleKeepForeverList
member.summary: Add to the 'Keep Forever' Jurisdiction list

member.name: T:TRIM.SDK.Keyword
member.summary: An individual term within the Content Manager thesaurus, used to provide a controlled terminology with which to index Records

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Keyword.HasNotes
member.summary: Gets a boolean value indicating whether there have been any notes attached to thesaurus term.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Keyword.HasRelatedKeywords
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether this Thesaurus Term has any 'krRelatedTo' type relationship with any other Thesaurus Terms.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Keyword.IdentificationNumber
member.summary: Gets or sets a string which uniquely identifies this Thesaurus Term.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Keyword.IsAPrimaryTerm
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether this Thesaurus Term is a Primary Term. A Primary Term is a term which is used at the beginning of Record Titles.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Keyword.IsForbidden
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether this Thesaurus Term is forbidden. A forbidden term cannot be applied to a record. Use the Keywords.SelectByUseTerms method to find the term to use instead.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Keyword.IsNodeLabel
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether this Thesaurus Term is a Node-label Term. A Node-label Term may be used to classify groups of terms but can not be applied to records.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Keyword.IsPrompt
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether this Thesaurus Term is a Prompt Term. A Prompt Term allows the user to add free text in square brackets after the Thesaurus Term.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Keyword.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the keyword. This is the string that is used in the generatedTitle when titling a Record by Thesaurus titling.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Keyword.Source
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the source authority of this Thesaurus Term. This may indicate, for example, the publisher of a Thesaurus Term imported from a standard set of terms used by the organization.

member.name: F:TRIM.SDK.LayoutPurpose.Publish
member.summary: For Publishing a Content Manager Object Type

member.name: T:TRIM.SDK.LdapConfiguration
member.summary: The LdapConfiguration class represents the current TRIM directory synchronization configuration for a dataset. It is only accessible by administrators.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.LdapConfiguration.#ctor(TRIM.SDK.Database)
member.summary: Constructs a LdapConfiguration object which will allow you to access the directory synchronization configuration.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.LdapConfiguration.ImportFromXml(System.String)
member.summary: Imports the directory synchronization configuration from an XML file.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.LdapConfiguration.ExportToXml(System.String)
member.summary: Exports the directory synchronization configuration to an XML file.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.LdapConfiguration.SetLdapPassword(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Sets the password used to connect to an LDAP server. The server name must match one of the servers specified in the directory synchronization configuration.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.LocaleUserOptions.#ctor(TRIM.SDK.Database)
member.summary: Constructor for the LocaleUserOptions option set.

member.name: T:TRIM.SDK.Location
member.summary: The Location object is the second most important object in the Content Manager Object Model. It is used to record the various relationships between people and places and records. There are many types of locations as indicated by the TypeOfLocation enumeration

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Location.ActualBarcode
member.summary: Gets a string containing the internal Content Manager Barcode of this Location.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Location.AdditionalLogin
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the additional Network Login by which this location may log in to the Content Manager Dataset.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Location.Administrator
member.summary: Gets the Location for which this Location holds a relationship of type 'Administered By'.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Location.AfterHoursPhoneNumber
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the home number of this Location.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Location.AllAdministrators
member.summary: Gets a string listing all locations that are administrators of this location.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Location.AllMembers
member.summary: Gets a string listing all locations that are members of this location.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Location.AllMemberships
member.summary: Gets a string listing all locations that this location is a member of.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Location.AllMembershipsRecursive
member.summary: Gets a string listing all locations that this location is a member of, and all locations that those locations are a member of, etc).

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Location.BasedOnUserType
member.summary: Gets a UserTypes value which determines the underlying user type of this Location (only relevant if the UserType is a custom one).

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Location.CanDeliverDirect
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean property indicating whether delivery requests can be handled by direct delivery to the request location, rather than via a transit location

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Location.CanLogin
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether this Location can log in to the Content Manager Context Dataset.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Location.CanViewAllDetails
member.summary: Gets a boolean property indicating whether the current user can view all the details of this location.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Location.Committee
member.summary: Gets the Location of Location Type 'Committee' for which this Location holds a relationship of type 'Member Of'. If there is more than one, it returns the Location designated as the default committee. Use the Location.AddRelationship method to create relationships between Locations, through which this property may be set.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Location.CutoffTime
member.summary: Gets or sets the time of day (in seconds past midnight) at which requests are cut-off and must be processed the following day.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Location.DateAccessModified
member.summary: Gets a datetime property indicating when the most recent change was made to the security profile, permissions or group membership for this location.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Location.DateOfBirth
member.summary: Gets or sets the date of birth of this Location.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Location.DefaultJurisdiction
member.summary: Gets or sets the default jurisdiction of this location. A location can either have a default jurisdiction or a default jurisdiction group.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Location.DeliverContainersOnly
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean property indicating whether deliver requests are only support for container records (folders and boxes) rather than individual documents.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Location.DeliveryLocation
member.summary: Gets a location property which represents the location for staging pickup/delivery requests

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Location.EmailAddress
member.summary: Gets a string containing the email address of this Location. If there is more than one email address in the Electronic Addresses for this location, the default email address is returned. If there is no default, the latest added email address is returned.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Location.FaxNumber
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the fax number of this Location.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Location.ForeignBarcode
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing an external system's barcodes for this Location. For multiple barcodes, separate each with a semi-colon. No barcode can be longer than 30 characters.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Location.FormalPreamble
member.summary: Gets a string containing a form of this Location's name to be used in formal correspondence, to complete the salutation: 'Dear ...'. An example formal preamble could be: 'Mr. Abbott', so that the salutation becomes: 'Dear Mr. Abbott'. Note: This property is set automatically by Content Manager. For the title to be included in the formal preamble you must ensure the 'Display any Title' option is checked in Tools - System Options - Locations.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Location.FormattedAddress
member.summary: Gets a string containing the formatted address of this Location. This is by default the postal address of the location if there is one, otherwise the street address. It contains the country name in ISO format.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Location.FormattedName
member.summary: Gets a string containing the Display Name of this Location. The format of the Display Name is dependent on the system settings for 'Display and Reporting Format for names of People' under Tools - Content Manager Administration - System Options - Locations Tab.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Location.FullFormattedName
member.summary: Gets a string containing the Full Description of this Location. The Full Description consists of the Location's organization and Display Name. The Display Name is contained alone in the property Location.FormattedName

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Location.GenderValue
member.summary: Gets or sets a gnGender enum value indicating the gender of this Location.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Location.GivenNames
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the given names of this Location.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Location.GpsLocation
member.summary: Gets or sets a geography value representing the GPS reference point for this location

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Location.HasAValidLogin
member.summary: Gets a boolean property indicating whether this location has a valid login.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Location.HoldingOrganizationName
member.summary: Gets a string representing the name of the holding organization for this location. This is based on the default parent organization if it exists.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Location.HomeDataset
member.summary: Gets or sets a string value indicating, for a visitor login, the id of the dataset that is the home dataset that the visitor normally works with.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Location.Honorific
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the title of this Location (for example, Mr., Ms., Dr. etc).

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Location.IdNumber
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the unique ID number for this Location

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Location.InformalPreamble
member.summary: Gets a string containing a form of this Location's name to be used in informal correspondence, to complete the salutation: 'Dear ...'. An example informal preamble could be: 'Peter', so that the salutation becomes: 'Dear Peter'.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Location.Initials
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the full set of initials of this Location.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Location.InternetMailAddress
member.summary: Gets a string containing the email address of this Location which is of email Type 'Internet'. If there is more than one Internet email address in the Electronic Addresses for this location, the default Internet email address is returned. If there is no default, the latest added Internet email address is returned. Create a new LocEAddress child object of EAddress Type 'etEAdressType.etMail' and SubType 'SMTP' to add a new Internet email address for this Location.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Location.IsVisitor
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating if this user is a visitor login from the same managed service provider.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Location.IsWithin
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether this Location is internal.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Location.JobDescription
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the Job Title of this Location (for example, Chief Executive Officer).

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Location.KeepAddressHistory
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether a history of address changes for this Location should be kept. When the Address History is enabled, modifying an existing LocAddress will cause a new LocAddress child object containing the old address to be automatically created and set to inactive. The LocAddress object that was modified contains the new address and remains active.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Location.LatestLogin
member.summary: Gets a datetime value indicating when this location most recently logged in.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Location.LdapSynchDN
member.summary: Gets or sets the LDAP Distinguished Name associated with this locations (used for LDAP Synchronization)

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Location.LdapSynchEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether LDAP synchronization is enabled for this location.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Location.LdapSynchLastUpdated
member.summary: Gets or sets a datetime value indicating when this location was last updated by the LDAP Synchronization tool.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Location.LoginDetails
member.summary: Gets a string containing the login details for this Location including 'login enabled' status and user type. The format of the string varies according to various circumstances of the location.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Location.LoginExpires
member.summary: Gets or sets the date the login for this Location will expire, if it is a time limited login.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Location.LogsInAs
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the Network Login by which this Location may log in to the Content Manager Dataset.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Location.LongHonorific
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the longer form of the title of this Location (for example, Mister ).

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Location.MobileNumber
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the cell/mobile number of this Location.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Location.NickName
member.summary: Gets or sets the string containing the unique name or abbreviation of this Location.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Location.OldPostalAddresses
member.summary: Gets a string containing all previous mailing addresses of this location.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Location.OldPostalAddressesISO
member.summary: Gets a string containing all previous mailing addresses of this location in ISO format.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Location.OldStreetAddresses
member.summary: Gets a string containing all previous street addresses of this location.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Location.OldStreetAddressesISO
member.summary: Gets a string containing all previous street addresses of this location in ISO format.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Location.PermissionsCustomized
member.summary: Gets a boolean property indicating if this user permissions have been customized to be different from a normal user of this type

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Location.PhoneNumber
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the main telephone number of this Location. Mobile, fax and home telephone numbers are held in the mobileNo, faxNo and ahPhoneNo properties, respectively.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Location.Position
member.summary: Gets the Location of Location Type 'Position' for which this Location holds a relationship of type 'Member Of'. If there is more than one, it returns the Location designated as the default position. Use the Location.AddRelationship method to create relationships between Locations, through which this property may be set.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Location.PostalAddress
member.summary: Gets a string containing the formatted postal address of this location.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Location.PostNominal
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the suffix of this Location (for example, BA, PhD etc).

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Location.ProjectTeam
member.summary: Gets the Location of Location Type 'Project Team' for which this Location holds a relationship of type 'Member Of'. If there is more than one, it returns the Location designated as the default project team. Use the Location.AddRelationship method to create relationships between Locations, through which this property may be set.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Location.ProviderContainer
member.summary: Gets or sets a Record Container which will be used when automatically capturing electronic activity log files from storage providers.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Location.ProviderLogRecordType
member.summary: Gets or sets a Record Type which will be used when automatically capturing electronic activity log files from storage providers.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Location.RequestResponseHigh
member.summary: Gets or sets the time interval (in seconds) allowed for servicing of high priority requests.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Location.RequestResponseLow
member.summary: Gets or sets the time interval (in seconds) allowed for servicing of low priority requests.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Location.RequestResponseMedium
member.summary: Gets or sets the time interval (in seconds) allowed for servicing of medium priority requests.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Location.RequestsNeedApproval
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean property indicating whether requests for records that are located at this location (home) need to be approved by a Request administrator.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Location.ReviewDate
member.summary: Gets the date this Location's settings are due to be reviewed (for example, when a Temporary Staff Member is due to leave the organization).

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Location.Salutation
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing a custom greeting by which this Location is to be addressed in correspondence. For example:'Dear President'.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Location.SecondAdditionalLogin
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the second additional Network Login by which this location may log in to the Content Manager Dataset.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Location.SecurityKeys
member.summary: Gets a comma-separated string listing a set of record viewing access keys held by this user.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Location.SecurityString
member.summary: Gets or sets a string listing the security level and security caveats assigned to this Location, delimited by commas ','. The first element listed is always the security level, followed by the caveats.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Location.SortName
member.summary: Gets or sets the string containing the sort name of this Location. This is the name that appears in the Locations List Pane.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Location.StreetAddress
member.summary: Gets a string containing the formatted street address of this location.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Location.Supervisor
member.summary: Gets the Location for which this Location holds a relationship of type 'Supervised By'. Use the Location.AddRelationship method to create relationships between Locations, through which this property may be set.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Location.Surname
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the full surname (including any prefix) of this Location.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Location.SurnameNoPrefix
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the non prefix part of the surname of this Location. For example 'Garderen' is the non prefix part of the full surname 'van Garderen'.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Location.SurnamePrefix
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the prefix part of the surname of this Location. For example 'van' is the prefix part of the full surname 'van Garderen'.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Location.TypeOfLocation
member.summary: Gets or sets the enum value containing the location type of this Location, for example: Person.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Location.Unit

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Location.UsedForStatistics
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether this location is to be used for aggregating statistics.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Location.UseProfileOf

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Location.UserLicenseType

For example, the string contains the Web Page URL if the electronic address is a WebPage, the file path (set) or Electronic Store Reference (get) for the image file if the electronic address is a signature or an image, or the email address if the electronic address is an email.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.LocationEAddress.ElectronicAddressType
member.summary: Gets or sets an etEAddressType enum value indicating the Electronic Address Type of this LocEAddress. For example etMail(email), etUrl(Web Page), etRdn (Signature) and etImage (Image).

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.LocationEAddress.EmailAddressTypeString
member.summary: Gets or sets the email Address Type of this LocEAddress, if it is an email. The valid string values are: 'SMTP' (Internet), 'MS' (Microsoft Mail Server for PC), 'CCMAIL' (Lotus cc:Mail), 'NGW' (GroupWise), 'EX' (Microsoft Exchange), 'NOTES' (Lotus Notes), and 'UNKNOWN' (Unknown).

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.LocationEAddress.EStore
member.summary: Gets an ElectronicStore object which is the Electronic Store where this LocEAddress is kept, if the LocEAddress is an image or a signature.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.LocationEAddress.EStoreId
member.summary: Gets a string containing the ID of the Electronic Store where this LocEAddress is kept, if the LocEAddress is an image or a signature.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.LocationEAddress.IsPreferred
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether this LocEAddress is the preferred (default) Electronic Address of the Location.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.LocationEAddress.Name
member.summary: Gets a string corresponding to the Details field of the Electronic Address.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.LocationEAddress.SetEmailAddress(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Sets up this LocEAddress object as an email LocEAddress of the nominated email address, name and type (as used in MAPI systems).

member.name: T:TRIM.SDK.LocationEAddresses

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.LocationEAddresses.getItem(System.UInt32)

member.summary: Initialises a new object of this child object collection

member.summary: Gets the parent object of this child object collection

members.member: Note that the IEnumerator documentation requires an InvalidOperationException to be thrown whenever the collection is modified. This has been done for changes in the size of the collection but not when one of the elements of the collection is modified as it is a bit tricky to detect unmanaged code that modifies the collection under our feet.

member.name: T:TRIM.SDK.ObjectDef
member.summary: A helper class that allows you to determine generic capabilities of any of the objects in the TRIM object model.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.#ctor(TRIM.SDK.BaseObjectTypes)
member.summary: Constructs an ObjectDef object based on the specified object type enumeration value.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.#ctor(TRIM.SDK.BaseObjectTypes,TRIM.SDK.Database)
member.summary: Constructs an ObjectDef object based on the specified object type enumeration value. This form of constructor allows you to specify a database which is used to retrieve customised captions.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique identifier for this Object Definition

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.Name
member.summary: Gets a string containing the unique name for the object corresponding to this Object Definition. This unique name is not changed when the object is captioned.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.Abbreviation
member.summary: Gets a string containing the unique 3-character abbreviation used internally for the object corresponding to this Object Definition.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.Caption
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the descriptive caption for this object. Note that to set a caption, this object must have been constructed with a valid Database parameter. To make caption changes permanent, call the SaveCaptionChanges method of the database

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.CaptionPlural
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the descriptive caption for a collection of these objects Note that to set a caption, this object must have been constructed with a valid Database parameter. To make caption changes permanent, call the SaveCaptionChanges method of the database

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.Icon
member.summary: Gets the enumerated icon value for the icon which is associated with this object.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.IsChild
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether the object of this ObjectDef is a child object.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.HasFavorites
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether there are any objects of this ObjectDef in the current user's Favorites list.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.InXMLSchema
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether the object corresponding to this Object Definition has an XML Schema definition that enables it to be exported to XML in the ExportToXML method.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.HasHierarchy
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether the objects of this Object Definition have a hierarchical structure

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.HasValidDateRange
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether an object corresponding to this Object Definition may be assigned a date range within which it is active.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.HasUserFields
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether the objects of this Object Definition have any user fields assigned.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.CanBeUserFieldFormat
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether this type of object can be a format for a user-defined field.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.HasBarcode
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether the objects of this Object Definition may have a foreign (external) barcode assigned.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.HasNotes
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether the objects of this Object Definition have a free text field for notes.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.HasAudit
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether objects of this Object Definition have audit capabilities

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.HasPrimaryACL
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether each object corresponding to this Object Definition has its own set of access controls that explicitly control access to the object

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.HasCopiedACL
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether the objects of this Object Definition have access controls that may be inherited by other objects. For example, Classifications have a set of access controls that may be inherited by records using the Classification.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.PrimaryACLEnum
member.summary: Gets the enum value describing the access control set that is applied to objects of this Object Definition as primary access controls. Primary access controls are the object's own set of access controls that explicitly control access to it.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.CopiedACLEnum
member.summary: Gets the enum describing the access control set that is inherited from this object by other TRIM objects, if it has copied access controls. This object has copied access controls if the 'HasCopiedACL' property is true.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.PurposeEnum
member.summary: Gets the enum describing the purpose for this object when testing whether it is valid for usage in a certain context.Â Â This is used by TrimMainObjectSearch.SetPurpose and TrimMainObject.IsValidFor functions.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.HasExtraPurposeParameter(System.Int32)
member.summary: For the given purpose, indicates whether extra information can be provided to supplement a given purpose value. For example, when testing whether a record is suitable as a container (RecordPurposes.FindContainerFor) you can specify an extra parameter as the contained item's record type, which allows the function to provide a more accurate validation.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.ExtraPurposeEnum(System.Int32)
member.summary: If the specified purpose has an extra purpose parameter, it will be either an object or an enum value. For example, RecordPurposes.FindContainerFor can have a RecordType object as an extra parameter, LabelPurposes.Attach can have a BaseObjectTypes enum value indicating what type of object you are selecting the label to attach to. If the extra purpose parameter for the specified purposeValue is an enumeration, this method returns the type of enumeration, otherwise it returns AllEnumerations.Unknown.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.ExtraPurposeObjectType(System.Int32)
member.summary: If the specified purpose has an extra purpose parameter, it will be either an object or an enum value. For example, RecordPurposes.FindContainerFor can have a RecordType object as an extra parameter, LabelPurposes.Attach can have a BaseObjectTypes enum value indicating what type of object you are selecting the label to attach to. If the extra purpose parameter for the specified purposeValue is a uri of an object, this method returns the type of object, otherwise it returns BaseObjectTypes.Unknown.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.HasSecurity
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether objects of this Object Definition may be assigned a security profile

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.HasCopiedSecurity
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether objects of this Object Definition have a security profile that may be inherited by other objects.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.NamePropertyId
member.summary: Gets a PropertyIds enum value containing the property id for the default 'unique naming' property for the object, by which it may be instantiated instead of by uri. For example, the Record object's Name property is the Record Number ('Number' property).

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.PrefixPropertyId
member.summary: Gets a PropertyIds enum value containing the id for the property of this object that is searched when selecting by prefix (that is, when using the 'SelectByPrefix' method).

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.ToolTipPropertyId
member.summary: Gets a PropertyIds enum value containing the id for the property of this object that should be used in a tool tip. For example, the ToolTip property for a record is the 'Title' property, which may be more informative to the user than the Record's Name property (the Record Number).

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.NotesPropertyId
member.summary: Gets a PropertyIds enum value containing the id for the property of this object that should be used in a tool tip. For example, the ToolTip property for a record is the 'Title' property, which may be more informative to the user than the Record's Name property (the Record Number).

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.HierarchySearchClauseId
member.summary: Gets a SearchClauseIds enum value containing the search clause id that can be used if searching by hierarchy.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.PrefixSearchClauseId
member.summary: Gets a SearchClauseIds enum value containing the search clause id that can be used if searching by hierarchy.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.HasLabels
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether objects of this type may be attached to user labels

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.AvailableOffline
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether objects of this type are available offline (i.e. without a workgroup server connection)

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.HasContextMenu
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether this object type has a context menu (usually displayed when clicking the right mouse button. See the MenuPopup class for more details on loading context menus.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.RequiresAProductFeature
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether this object requires a product feature to be activated before it can be made visible

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.ProductFeature
member.summary: Gets a ProductFeatures enumerate value indicating the product feature required before this object should be exposed in a user interface. Check the RequiresAProductFeature first before calling this function

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.FindByName(System.String)
member.summary: Constructs an Object Definition to correspond to that with the nominated unique object name.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.FindByName(System.String,TRIM.SDK.Database)
member.summary: Constructs an Object Definition to correspond to that with the nominated unique object name. Providing the database object allows the returned objectDef object to be able to access any customised captions.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.FindByAbbreviation(System.String)
member.summary: Constructs an Object Definition to correspond to that with the nominated unique 3-character abbreviation.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.FindByAbbreviation(System.String,TRIM.SDK.Database)
member.summary: Constructs an Object Definition to correspond to that with the nominated unique 3-character abbreviation. Providing the database object allows the returned objectDef object to be able to access any customised captions.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.SelectAllObjects
member.summary: Gets an array of all the Object Definitions currently defined in the TRIM object model

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.SelectAllObjects(TRIM.SDK.Database)
member.summary: Gets an array of all the Object Definitions currently defined in the TRIM object model Providing the database object allows the returned array to have objectDef objects that will be able to access any customised captions.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.SelectAllMainObjects
member.summary: Gets an array of all the Object Definitions corresponding to a TrimMainObject currently defined in the TRIM object model. It excludes all child objects.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.SelectAllMainObjects(TRIM.SDK.Database)
member.summary: Gets an array of all the Object Definitions corresponding to a TrimMainObject currently defined in the TRIM object model. It excludes all child objects. Providing the database object allows the returned array to have objectDef objects that will be able to access any customised captions.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.SelectAllChildObjects
member.summary: Gets an array of all the child Object Definitions for this TRIM object.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.SelectAllChildObjects(TRIM.SDK.Database)
member.summary: Gets an array of all the child Object Definitions for this TRIM object. Providing the database object allows the returned array to have objectDef objects that will be able to access any customized captions.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.ObjectDef.SelectAllSearchableObjects(TRIM.SDK.Database)
member.summary: Gets an array of all the Object Definitions corresponding to a TrimMainObject currently defined in the TRIM object model that should be displayed in a search menu. It excludes objects that are part of an inactivate feature, excludes child objects, and objects that would only be useful if you could edit them.

member.name: T:TRIM.SDK.ObjectSelector
member.summary: The ObjectSelector class is used to select one or more objects from a TrimMainObjectList

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.ObjectSelector.SelectOne(TRIM.SDK.Hwnd,TRIM.SDK.TrimMainObjectSearch)
member.summary: Displays the TRIM tree box allowing the user to choose one of the items in the list. Will return null if the user did not make a selection.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.ObjectSelector.SelectMany(TRIM.SDK.Hwnd,TRIM.SDK.TrimMainObjectSearch)
member.summary: Displays the TRIM tree box allowing the user to choose one or more items from the supplied list, using the TRIM tag feature. Will return null if the user did not make a selection.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.ObjectSelector.SelectChild(TRIM.SDK.Hwnd,TRIM.SDK.TrimMainObject,TRIM.SDK.BaseObjectTypes)
member.summary: Select a child object from the list of child objects of the nominated type.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.ObjectSelector.DisplayResults(TRIM.SDK.Hwnd,TRIM.SDK.TrimMainObjectSearch)
member.summary: Displays the TRIM tree box allowing the user to browse the results in the supplied list.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.ObjectSelector.EditQuery(TRIM.SDK.Hwnd,TRIM.SDK.TrimMainObjectSearch)
member.summary: Displays the TRIM string-based search editor to allow the user to change details of the search

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.ObjectSelector.EditQuery(TRIM.SDK.Hwnd,TRIM.SDK.TrimMainObjectSearch,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Displays a TRIM Search editor to allow the user to change details of the search. You can allow the user to edit the query using their preferred editor, or simply force the use of the string based editor. Queries that are not editable with the Boolean editor will always be displayed using the editor most suitable.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.ObjectSelector.SelectContainerRecord(TRIM.SDK.Hwnd,TRIM.SDK.Database,System.String,TRIM.SDK.Record)
member.summary: Displays the TRIM desktop dialog in order that the user can select a container record. You can pass in a record if you wan to ensure that the container is suitable for containing that record (pass NULL otherwise). The function return the container if the user makes a selection, otherwise a NULLvalue is returned. You can seed the search with a record number (or part thereof).

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.ObjectSelector.SetSearchAsUserStartPoint(TRIM.SDK.Hwnd,TRIM.SDK.TrimMainObjectSearch,System.Boolean)
member.summary: populates the supplied search object with the default search according to the current user's preference Since one preference involves editing the query, it is possible for the user to cancel out, in which case the function will return false. If you don't specify the overwrite option, the search will only be modified if it contains no existing clauses.

member.name: T:TRIM.SDK.ObjectViewer

member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating if the journal headers for the email should be stored in the EML document

member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating if the email capture program should create contacts from email recipients

member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating when creating contacts from email recipients, limit contacts to only locations that already exist in the dataset. This prevents creating new 'unknown' locations from email addresses that haven't already been registered for a location.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.OriginEmailCaptureSettings.CheckForDuplicates
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating if the email capture program should check for duplicates based on messageId and prevent them being added into TRIM

member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating if the email capture program should use the bulk data loader

member.summary: Gets or sets a LogLevels enumerated value indicating the level of detail to be provided in the email capture log file

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.OriginEmailCaptureSettings.SpamFilters
member.summary: Gets or sets a an array of spam filter rules to be used to determine if an email message is to be deemed as spam and therefore not added into TRIM

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.OriginEmailCaptureSettings.MoveSpamToFolder
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating if the spam mail messages should be moved over to a separate folder rather than being simply deleted

member.summary: Gets or sets a string value indicating the name of the folder to put any spam messages (if the MoveToSpamFolder setting is turned on)

member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating if the matching value contains regular expressions

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.OriginEmailCaptureSpamRule.CheckCase
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating if the value check should be case-sensitive

members.member: Note that the IEnumerator documentation requires an InvalidOperationException to be thrown whenever the collection is modified. This has been done for changes in the size of the collection but not when one of the elements of the collection is modified as it is a bit tricky to detect unmanaged code that modifies the collection under our feet.

member.summary: Gets a boolean property indicating if this page item should be made visible to the currently logged-in user

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.PageItemDefinition.EditValue
member.summary: Gets the value for the property or field definition that is being edited by this form item. Only applies when an editing object has been supplied in the form constructor.

member.summary: Gets a starting point for object selection (when this item represents a TrimMainObject). For records, returns a suitable DesktopStartStates enum value, for other objects, returns a SearchStartPoint enum value

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.PageItemDefinition.IsTrimIcon
member.summary: Gets a boolean value indicating if this item represents a standard Trim Icon

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.PageItemDefinition.EnablingPageItem
member.summary: Gets a possible parent item that represents another page item used to determine if this item should be enabled or not. For example, if the "LookupSet.ItemsHaveHierarchy" form item is checked, then the form item for "LookupSet.OnlySelectLowestLevel" should be enabled, otherwise it should be unavailable.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.PageItemDefinition.EnablingPageItemValue
member.summary: Gets the value that the parent item should have if this item is to be enabled. Commonly, for check boxes, it will be simply "true", however when a control is enabled based on a parent combo box control, then this could return the value that needs to be selected inside that parent combobox.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.PageItemDefinition.MoveUp
member.summary: Move this item up one position in its page

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.PageItemDefinition.MoveDown
member.summary: Move this item down one position in its page

member.summary: Gets a boolean indicating if the explanatory text should be displayed in Italics.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.PageItemDefinition.IsBold
member.summary: Gets a boolean indicating if the explanatory text should be displayed in Bold type.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.PageItemDefinition.ExplanatoryText
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the explanatory text for a item that is a static text caption on the page. (i.e. an item which returns true for 'IsExplanatoryText').

member.summary: Gets a boolean indicating if this form item has some instructions which could be displayed as 'banner text' in a data entry form control. This is only supported for certain property or field types.

member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing some text to be displayed as 'place holder text' in a data entry form control. It should appear dimmed within the control and disappear once the user starts typing.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.PageItemDefinition.HoverText
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing some text to be displayed as 'hover text' in a data entry form control. It should appear as a tool tip.

If the property is an object data type ('pfObject'), the TRIM Object type is held in the 'ObjectType' property. If it is an enumerated type ('pfEnum'), the TRIM Enumeration type is held in the 'EnumType' property.

member.summary: Gets a BaseObjectTypes enum value indicating the object type of this property, if it is of PropertyDef.Format 'pfObject'.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.PropertyDef.IsNameProperty

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.PropertyDef.IsExposedInSDK

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.PropertyDef.PFFormat
member.summary: Gets a poPropertyOrFieldFormat enum value indicating the generic format of this property in the context of formats available to TRIM Properties or Fields.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.PropertyDef.Length
member.summary: Gets the length of this property if it is a string

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.PropertyDef.TrueString
member.summary: Gets the string representing true for a property of type boolean. Most likely this will be 'True', but for some boolean properties, it may contain something more descriptive. For example, the property 'IsActive' may have a true string of 'Active' and a false string of 'InActive'

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.PropertyDef.FalseString
member.summary: Gets the string representing false for a property of type boolean. Most likely this will be 'False', but for some boolean properties, it may contain something more descriptive. For example, the property 'IsActive' may have a true string of 'Active' and a false string of 'Inactive'.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.PropertyDef.IsDataGridColumn
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether this Property would be useful displayed in a data grid.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.PropertyDef.IsDefaultDataGridColumn
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether this Property should be displayed as a default column in a data grid.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.PropertyDef.SearchClauseId
member.summary: Gets a SearchClauseIds value indicating whether this property can be used for searches. Returns Unknown if it is not suitable.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.PropertyDef.GetSortClauseId(TRIM.SDK.BaseObjectTypes,System.Boolean)
member.summary: This returns the same as the SearchClauseId property, provided the search clause is sortable. The strict parameter will also exclude and search clause that does not perform a strictly alphabetic sort, such as properties that are enums or objects)

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.PropertyDef.CanView
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether the current user has the permission to view this property. Some system settings such as classified security, DoD 5015.3 compliance, require properties to be hidden.

members.member: Note that the IEnumerator documentation requires an InvalidOperationException to be thrown whenever the collection is modified. This has been done for changes in the size of the collection but not when one of the elements of the collection is modified as it is a bit tricky to detect unmanaged code that modifies the collection under our feet.
