member.name: T:TRIM.SDK.PropertyOrFieldDef
member.summary: The PropertyOrFieldDef class provides a generic abstraction of TRIM properties and user-defined fields.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.PropertyOrFieldDef.#ctor
member.summary: Construct a PropertyOrFieldDef that encapsulates a property definition.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.PropertyOrFieldDef.#ctor(TRIM.SDK.PropertyIds)
member.summary: Construct a PropertyOrFieldDef that encapsulates a property definition. The database parameter allows the item access to any customized captions.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.PropertyOrFieldDef.#ctor(TRIM.SDK.PropertyIds,TRIM.SDK.Database)
member.summary: Construct a PropertyOrFieldDef that encapsulates a property definition.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.PropertyOrFieldDef.#ctor(TRIM.SDK.PropertyDef)
member.summary: Construct a PropertyOrFieldDef that encapsulates a FieldDefinition object.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.PropertyOrFieldDef.IsAProperty
member.summary: Gets a boolean value indicating whether this object represents a property (as opposed to a field).

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.PropertyOrFieldDef.IsAField
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether this object represents a user field (as opposed to a property).

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.PropertyOrFieldDef.PropertyId
member.summary: Gets a PropertyIds enumeration value containing the propertyId associated with this object, if it is a property.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.PropertyOrFieldDef.Property
member.summary: Gets the PropertyDef object associated with this PropertyOrFieldDef, if it is a property.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.PropertyOrFieldDef.FieldUri
member.summary: Gets the unique identifier of the FieldDefinition associated with this object, if it is a user field.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.PropertyOrFieldDef.Field
member.summary: Gets or sets the FieldDefinition object associated with this PropertyOrFieldDef, it if is a user field

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.PropertyOrFieldDef.PFFormat
member.summary: Gets a poPropertyOrFieldFormat enum value indicating the generic format of this property/field in the context of formats available to TRIM Properties or Fields.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.PropertyOrFieldDef.ObjectType
member.summary: Gets a BaseObjectTypes enum value indicating the object type of this property, if PropertyOrFieldDef.PFFormat is 'Object'.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.PropertyOrFieldDef.Caption
member.summary: Gets the caption corresponding to this property or field.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.PropertyOrFieldDef.GetIcon(TRIM.SDK.IconUsage)
member.summary: Gets the identifier of the internal TRIM icon associated with this property or field.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.PropertyOrFieldDef.GetIconEx(TRIM.SDK.IconUsage)
member.summary: Gets the TRIMicon associated with this property or field.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.PropertyOrFieldDef.SortMode
member.summary: Gets the sorting mode most suited to the values of this property.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.PropertyOrFieldDef.StringAlignment
member.summary: Gets the preferred method for aligning a string when displaying values of this property.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.PropertyOrFieldDef.IconAndOrTextMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the preferred style for displaying an icon when displaying a value for this property

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.PropertyOrFieldDef.BestFitColumn
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean property indicating whether the a column based on this property should be set to the width of the largest value displayed. too wide to fit into an allocated area.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.PropertyOrFieldDef.IsDefaultDataGridColumn
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean property indicating whether the a column based on this property should be visible.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.PropertyOrFieldDef.ColumnWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets an integer property indicating the display width (in an arbitrary pixel unit) of a column based on this item.whether the a column based on this property.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.PropertyOrFieldDef.DefaultColumnCharacters
member.summary: Gets an integer property indicating the default number of characters that should be displayed when creating a column based on this property.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.PropertyOrFieldDef.IsMandatory(TRIM.SDK.TrimObject)
member.summary: Gets a boolean value indicating if the property or field is mandatory (cannot have an empty/null value) for the supplied TRIM object.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.PropertyOrFieldDef.IsHyperlink
member.summary: Gets a boolean value indicating if the property or field is a web url hyperlink

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.PropertyOrFieldDef.IsEMailAddress
member.summary: Gets a boolean value indicating if the property or field is an email address

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.PropertyOrFieldDef.IsSuitableForAggregation(TRIM.SDK.BaseObjectTypes)
member.summary: Gets a boolean value indicating if the property or field can be used for aggregation

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.PropertyOrFieldDef.Compare(TRIM.SDK.PropertyOrFieldDef,TRIM.SDK.PropertyOrFieldDef)
member.summary: Compares two propertyOrFielDef objects, using the caption as a sort sequence

member.summary: Gets an array of PropertyOrFieldDef objects consisting of all properties for the specified object type, followed by all the user defined fields for the specified object type.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.PropertyOrFieldDef.GetAllPropertiesOrFields(TRIM.SDK.TrimObject)
member.summary: Gets an array of PropertyOrFieldDef objects consisting of all properties for the specified TrimObject, followed by all the user defined fields for the specified TrimObject.

member.summary: Gets an array of PropertyOrFieldDef objects consisting of all suitable data grid properties for the specified object type, followed by all the user defined fields for the specified object type.

member.summary: Gets an array of PropertyOrFieldDef objects consisting of all suitable data grid properties for the specified TrimObject, followed by all the user defined fields for the specified TrimObject.

member.summary: Gets an array of PropertyOrFieldDef objects consisting of all suitable data grid properties for the specified object type, followed by all the user defined fields for the specified object type.

member.summary: Gets an array of PropertyOrFieldDef objects consisting of all suitable data grid properties for the specified TrimObject, followed by all the user defined fields for the specified TrimObject.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.PropertyOrFieldDef.SetDataGridVisiblePropertiesOrFields(TRIM.SDK.TrimObject,TRIM.SDK.PropertyOrFieldDefList)
member.summary: Sets an array of PropertyOrFieldDef objects as the default settings for displaying a set of properties in a grid for the object type. Allows you to persist changes to ordering of columns, size and various data grid properties.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.PropertyOrFieldDef.SetDataGridVisiblePropertiesOrFields(TRIM.SDK.Database,TRIM.SDK.BaseObjectTypes,TRIM.SDK.PropertyOrFieldDefList)
member.summary: Sets an array of PropertyOrFieldDef objects as the default settings for displaying a set of properties in a grid for the object type. Allows you to persist changes to ordering of columns, size and various data grid properties.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.PropertyOrFieldDef.GetDetailedPropertiesOrFields(TRIM.SDK.TrimObject)
member.summary: Gets an array of PropertyOrFieldDef objects consisting of the current users selected 'show details' properties and fields for a specific object. These properties and fields typically represent the set of information required by the user when looking at an object in more detail.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.PropertyOrFieldDef.SetDetailedPropertiesOrFields(TRIM.SDK.TrimObject,TRIM.SDK.PropertyOrFieldDefList)
member.summary: Sets the current users preference for an array of PropertyOrFieldDef objects corresponding to the 'show details' properties and fields for a specific object. These properties and fields typically represent the set of information required by the user when looking at an object in more detail.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.PropertyOrFieldDef.GetCascadePropertiesOrFields(TRIM.SDK.TrimObject)
member.summary: Gets an array of PropertyOrFieldDef objects consisting of the current users selected 'show details' properties and fields for a specific object. These properties and fields typically represent the set of information required by the user when looking at an object in more detail.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.PropertyOrFieldDef.SetCascadePropertiesOrFields(TRIM.SDK.TrimObject,TRIM.SDK.PropertyOrFieldDefList)
member.summary: Sets the current users preference for an array of PropertyOrFieldDef objects corresponding to the 'show details' properties and fields for a specific object. These properties and fields typically represent the set of information required by the user when looking at an object in more detail.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.PropertyOrFieldDef.GetMandatoryPropertiesOrFields(TRIM.SDK.TrimObject)
member.summary: Gets an array of PropertyOrFieldDef objects consisting of all the 'mandatory' properties of the nominated object.

members.member: Note that the IEnumerator documentation requires an InvalidOperationException to be thrown whenever the collection is modified. This has been done for changes in the size of the collection but not when one of the elements of the collection is modified as it is a bit tricky to detect unmanaged code that modifies the collection under our feet.

member.summary: Sets the current value of this property to be the corresponding property/field of the specified TRIM object. An exception will be thrown if this property/field is not actually a property or field of the supplied TRIM object. Will set the modified state to false.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.PropertyOrFieldValue.Compare(TRIM.SDK.PropertyOrFieldValue,TRIM.SDK.PropertyOrFieldValue)
member.summary: Compares two PropertyOrFieldValue values to see which should appear first in a sort sequence. Generally assumed that both PropertyOrFieldValue values would be based on the same PropertyorFieldDef. Returns -1 to indicate that propertyOrFieldValue1 is less than propertyOrFieldValue1, 0 to indicate that the propertyOrFieldValues are equal +1 to indicate that propertyOrFieldValue1 is greater than propertyOrFieldValue1,

member.summary: Gets an Object representation of the current value - the Object represents the native class used represent this value.

member.name: T:TRIM.SDK.PsoDateType
member.summary: Physical Inactive Record Selection Date Types

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.RecentSearchMethodsUserOptions.#ctor(TRIM.SDK.Database)
member.summary: Constructor for the RecentSearchMethodsUserOptions option set.

member.name: T:TRIM.SDK.Record
member.summary: A Record is the fundamental object that is managed by Content Manager. It is usually a piece of evidence that must be kept for compliance or business reasons. To create a new record you must provide a RecordType object

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Record.#ctor(TRIM.SDK.Database,TRIM.SDK.TrimURI)
member.summary: Create a new record with the specified RecordType. This will not have a URI until it is saved.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Record.#ctor(TRIM.SDK.Database,System.String)
member.summary: Constructor for a new Record object.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.AccessExclusions
member.summary: Gets a string listing all the locations that have been specifically excluded from accessing this %b_record% using the Exclusions feature.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.AccessionNumber
member.summary: Gets or sets the accession number of a record. Traditionally the accession number is a number entered by archival staff when a record is retrieved from the archive. Content Manager does not base any business rules on the accession number.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.Actions
member.summary: Gets a string listing all Actions attached to this Record. The string contains the Action name, Responsible Location and the remaining time for completion for each Action, with a new line for each Action.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.Addressee
member.summary: Gets or sets the addressee of this Record. It can be set automatically, if there is an Electronic Document attached which is an email. Addressee is a type of contact location.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.AggregatedDisposal
member.summary: Gets a string describing the aggregated disposal schedule of a container by combining the innate disposal schedule for the container together with all the disposal instructions for the contents (recursively)

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.AllContacts
member.summary: Gets a string listing the names and contact types of all contacts attached to this Record. For example: 'Abbott, Peter (Mr) (Author); Ayling, A (Other)'.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.AllHolds
member.summary: Gets a string listing all holds on this record. As long as the record has a hold, it cannot be updated or destroyed. The string contains the Hold names delimited by semicolons ';'. Create a new Record.RecHold child object to add a hold to this Record.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.AllMeetings
member.summary: Gets a string listing all meetings for which this record is associated.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.AllParts
member.summary: Gets a string listing all parts of this record.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.AllRenditions
member.summary: Gets a string listing all renditions of this record.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.AllTodoItems
member.summary: Gets a string listing all todo items with this record. The string contains the To Do Items delimited by semicolons ';'.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.AllVersions
member.summary: Gets a string listing all versions of this record.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.AlternateContentsCount
member.summary: Gets a number indicating the number of records that are alternately contained within this record

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.AlternativeContainer
member.summary: Gets or sets the alternative container for this record.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.AlternativeContainers
member.summary: Gets a string listing Record Numbers and Record Titles of all alternative containers of this Record.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.AlternativeContents
member.summary: Gets or sets a string listing Record Numbers and Titles of any records alternatively contained by this Record.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.AnnotatedFrom
member.summary: Gets a string containing the record from which this record was annotated. That is, all the records related to this record with relationship type: Was Annotated To. Use the Record.AddRelationship method to create Relationships between Records.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.AnnotationsOf
member.summary: Gets a string listing the annotations of this record. That is, all the records related to this record with relationship type: Annotations Of. Use the Record.AddRelationship method to create relationships between records.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.ArchivePermDate
member.summary: Gets the date this record is due for archival (keep) as a result of an applied retention schedule.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.ArchiveTransferDate
member.summary: Gets the date this record is due for archival (transfer) as a result of an applied retention schedule.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.Assignee
member.summary: Gets the assignee location of this Record. The assignee location is traditionally used to hold the current location of a record. Use the Record.SetCurrentLocation method to set the value of this property.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.AssigneeStatus
member.summary: Gets the lsRecLocSubType enum value representing the current location (assignee) status of the record. The value indicates whether the Record is currently at home ('At Home'), at another location ('At Location'), in a container ('In Container'), in the space system ('In Space') or at an unknown location ('Missing').

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.AttachedKeywords
member.summary: Gets a string listing the attached Thesaurus Terms NOT used in the title of this Record. The string contains the Thesaurus Terms delimited by semicolons ';'.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.Author
member.summary: Gets or sets the author of this Record. It can be set automatically based on the logged in user or the document profile, if there is an Electronic Document attached. Author is a type of contact location.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.AuthorizationDueDate
member.summary: Gets or sets a datetime value indicating the date when all document authorization activities should be complete and the document finalized.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.AuthorizationMethod
member.summary: Gets or sets an AuthorizationMethods enumerated value indicating how this record should be authorized.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.AutoClassificationConfidenceLevel
member.summary: Gets or sets a number value (1-100) indicating the confidence level attained for the classification selected for Auto-Classification

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.AutoRenderToPDFOnSave
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether the a PDF rendition of the electronic document will be requested on save.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.Barcode
member.summary: Gets a string containing the internal Content Manager Barcode of this record.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.BasicMetadataOnly
member.summary: Gets a boolean property indicating that this record only supports basic metadata. This is determined by the UsualBehaviour of its RecordType and excludes metadata such as home location, assignee, actions, requests, workflow, contacts, relationships and revisions.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.BccdTo
member.summary: Gets a string listing the names of all bcc'd contacts attached to this record

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.BlueprintTitle
member.summary: Gets the Document Template used as the basis of this record.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.BypassRecordTypeAccessControls
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether this record bypasses any referenced access controls of the RecordType.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.CanUseClassification
member.summary: Gets a boolean property indicating whether the currently logged in user can use the classification associated with this record

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.CcdTo
member.summary: Gets a string listing the names of all cc'd contacts attached to this record

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.CheckedInBy
member.summary: Gets a location object that represents the person who checked in the electonic document attached to this record.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.CheckedInOn
member.summary: Gets the date on which the Electronic Document attached to this Record was checked in.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.CheckedOutOn
member.summary: Gets the date on which the Electronic Document attached to this Record was checked out.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.CheckedOutPath
member.summary: Gets the file path to which the E.lectronic Document attached to this Record was checked out.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.CheckedOutTo
member.summary: Gets the Location to whom the Electronic Document attached to this Record is currently checked out to.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.CheckOutType
member.summary: Gets a CheckOutStyles value indicating the current checked out state of the electronic document attached to this record.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.Classification
member.summary: Gets or sets the Classification by which this Record is classified. If the Record is titled by Classification, this sets the generated title. If the Record is numbered by Classification, this sets the Record Number.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.ClassOfRecord
member.summary: Gets or sets the class of this record. The record class reflects the relevance of a record to the organization, such as Vital, Corporate, Personal etc.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.Client
member.summary: Gets or sets the Location used to title the record if the record uses Client Location titling.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.ClientName
member.summary: Gets a string which is equivalent to the record title of the client record.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.ClientNumber
member.summary: Gets a string which is equivalent to the record number of the client record.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.ClientRecord
member.summary: Gets or sets a record which is the client record for this record. Can only set this property for new matters.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.Consignment
member.summary: Gets or sets the string containing an identifier allocated by an archival authority when batches of records are transferred. The consignment number is used to group all records of a shipment to the archives. The consignment number is an integral part of the retention process.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.ConsignmentObject
member.summary: Gets the consignment object which this record has been added to when using the Disposition Workflow product feature.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.Container
member.summary: Gets or sets the Container Record object of this record, if it is a contained record.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.ContainerHierarchy
member.summary: Gets a string property that describes the full container hierarchy for this record.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.ContentId
member.summary: Gets an external content id that is used to represent the current document content state. Normally a 128-bit hash of the document converted to a GUID hexedecimal format (eg 216B469E-D536-4CD7-9B7E-CA94BB0DDB61).

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.Contents
member.summary: If 256 or fewer Records in the container gets a string listing the Record Numbers and Titles of any Records contained by this Record, otherwise returns the contained Record count.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.ConversationId
member.summary: Gets a string value which represents a unique identifier for a mail message conversation (e.g. original message and all replies).

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.Creator
member.summary: Gets the location by whom this Record was registered in Content Manager.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.CSdeclassifyDetails
member.summary: Gets a string value representing the classified security 'Declassify Details' property

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.CSdeclassifyOn
member.summary: Gets a datetime value representing the classified security 'Declassify On' property

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.CSdowngradeDetails
member.summary: Gets a string value representing the classified security 'Downgrade Details' property

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.CSdowngradeOn
member.summary: Gets a datetime value representing the classified security 'Downgrade On' property

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.CSguideEntries
member.summary: Gets a string value representing the classified security 'Security Guide Entries' property

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.CSinitialSecurity
member.summary: Gets a string value representing the classified security 'Initial Security' property

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.CSlastReviewed
member.summary: Gets a string value representing the classified security 'Last Reviewed By' property

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.CSlastUpdateDetails
member.summary: Gets a string value representing the classified security 'Last Update Details' property

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.CSsecurityDetails
member.summary: Gets a string value representing the classified security 'Security Details' property

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.CurrentAction
member.summary: Gets a string containing the Action name, Responsible Location and the remaining time for completion for the current Action assigned to this Record.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.CurrentActionAssignee
member.summary: Gets the assignee of the current action in progress on this record.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.CurrentActivities
member.summary: Gets a string containing the activities, Location and the due date of all activities with Stutus of 'Started'.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.CurrentVersion
member.summary: Gets the Record object which is the current version of this record.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.DateAssigned
member.summary: Gets the date and time when the assignee was last changed.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.DateClosed
member.summary: Gets or sets the date the record was closed. No further contents can be added to a closed record and no new parts can be created for it. With part records when a new part is created the previous part is closed automatically. If a record is not already closed, you should use the CreateNewPart or CloseContainer function to close the record.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.DateCreated
member.summary: Gets or sets the date the record was created. It defaults to the date when the record is initially saved into Content Manager or to the date created of the electronic document, if one exists.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.DateDue
member.summary: Gets or sets the due date of the current action attached to this record, if there is any action attached. Else the due date can be set manually as a basic form of action tracking.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.DateFinalized
member.summary: Gets or sets the date when the Record was finalized. The electronic attachment of a finalized record cannot be edited.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.DateImported
member.summary: Gets or sets a datetime value indicating the date that this record was imported into the system.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.DateInactive
member.summary: Gets or sets the date that the disposition of this record was set to inactive.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.DateModified
member.summary: Gets the date the Electronic Document attached to this Record was modified, if there is an Electronic Document attached.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.DatePublished
member.summary: Gets or sets the date this Record was published to a Web Publish page. This date may be set when the Record is published as a web page through the Records.PublishAsHTML method. Else the Date Published can be set manually to track other forms of publishing, for example if the document was extracted and converted to PDF for distribution.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.DateReceived
member.summary: Get or sets a datetime indicating when a record was received by the organization. Defaults to DateRegistered, can be overwritten by the date received of an email message.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.DateRecycled
member.summary: Gets a datetime value indicating when this record was added to the Record Recycle Bin

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.DateRegistered
member.summary: Gets the date the record was registered in Content Manager.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.DateSuperseded
member.summary: Gets a datetime indicating when a record was supereceded (based on the when the superseded relationship was created)

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.DestructionDate
member.summary: Gets the date this Record is due for destruction. This calculated based on the Retention Schedule assigned to the record, if no retention schedule then it display the value specified for the manual destruction date property.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.DisposalDate
member.summary: Gets a datetime value indicating the date when this record was disposed

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.DisposalMethod
member.summary: Gets a DisposalType enumerated value indicating how this record was disposed

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.Disposition
member.summary: Gets or sets the current disposition of this record.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.DispositionChangedDate
member.summary: Gets the date of the most recent disposition change for this record.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.DispositionSchedule
member.summary: Gets a string containing the scheduled disposition events for this record.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.DocumentAttachPending
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether the user will be prevented from setting the DOSFile property on a record entry form. This is used when the SDK programmer wishes to put up a properties sheet for a record before SetDocument is called, and does not want the user to be able to select a document as part of completing the propertySheet (and the DOSfile field on the data entry form will allow them to do this in normal circumstances).

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.DocumentDetails
member.summary: Gets a string listing details about the attached Electronic Document. The string includes the current Electronic Document location, document type, file size, Document Store ID, and Status of the Electronic Document together with the date upon which the status was last updated to its current value. The details in the list are separated by commas.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.DocumentHash
member.summary: Gets an hash of the electronic document attached to this record. Note that the has will only be available if you had the Store Document Hashes system option enabled at the time the document was registered.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.DocumentLastAccessedDate
member.summary: Gets a datetime value indicating when the electronic document attached to this record was last accessed. Requires the document store being used by the record to support access date tracking.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.DocumentMissing
member.summary: Gets a Boolean property indicating whther the document was reported in the most recent storage integrity check.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.DocumentSize
member.summary: Gets the size of the Electronic Document attached to this Record in bytes.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.DocumentType
member.summary: Gets the type of the Electronic Document attached to this Record. For example, 'Microsoft Word Document'.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.DocumentURL
member.summary: Gets a internet URL for the document associated with this record, using the system setting for the type of brower to use for web links

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.DraftDueDate
member.summary: Gets or sets a datetime value indicating the date when the drafting of a document within a document review process is meant to be completed.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.Editor
member.summary: Gets or sets a location object representing the location resposible for editing the electronic document that is part of the document review process.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.EditState
member.summary: Gets a documentEditStatus enumerated value indicating the current edit state of the document.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.ESource
member.summary: Gets the file path from which the Electronic Document attached to this Record was first checked in. Note: Before the document is attached to the record (but the attach is pending) the file path of the Electronic Document is held in the Record.DOSfile property.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.EStore
member.summary: Gets the Document Store where the Electronic Document attached to this Record is kept.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.EStoreId
member.summary: Gets the filename (Store ID) for this Record's attached Electronic Document in the Electronic Store where it is kept.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.Extension
member.summary: Gets the file extension of the Electronic Document attached to this Record.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.ExternalEditingComplete
member.summary: Gets a Boolean property indicating that the external editing of the document is now complete.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.ExternalEditingCompletedBy
member.summary: Gets or sets a Location object indicating the person who has marked the external editing of the document associated with this record as complete and it is now ready to check in.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.ExternalEditingFinalizeOnCheckin
member.summary: Gets a Boolean property indicating that when doing a checkin the external editing process should finalize the record.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.ExternalEditorId
member.summary: Gets or sets a string representing an id for this record used in an external editing system such as OneDrive

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.ExternalReference
member.summary: Gets or sets the external identification number of the record. Traditionally this is used to register external reference numbers, such as a file reference on incoming correspondence.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.FilePath
member.summary: Gets or sets the file path of a pending electronic attachment. Once the document has been attached to the record, filePath no longer holds the original file path of the document - instead the original file path is held in the ESource property on the Record object.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.FinalizeOnSave
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether the record will be declared as final when saved.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.FolderOrigin
member.summary: Gets an Origin object that was used to allocate this folder when processing an import run.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.ForeignBarcode
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing an external organization's barcodes for this record. For multiple barcodes, separate each with a semi-colon. No barcode can be longer than 30 characters.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.FullClassification
member.summary: Gets the Expanded Classification Number of the Record. Set the Classification property to modify the value of this property.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.GeneratedTitle
member.summary: Gets or sets the structured part of the title generated if the record has a structured titling method. The generatedTitle must be set for the Thesaurus(ISO) and Thesaurus(Desc) titling methods.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.GpsLocation
member.summary: Gets or sets a geography value representing the GPS location of this record

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.HasEmailAttachments
member.summary: Gets a boolean value indicating whether the document attached to this record is an email with attachments.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.HasHold
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether there this record is on legal hold (either by having a hold attached or being inside a container/client or matter that is on hold). It should be called 'OnHold'.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.HasHoldAttached
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether there are one or more holds attached directly to this Record.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.HasLinkedDocuments
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether the electronic document attached to this record has any linked documents.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.HasNotes
member.summary: Gets a boolean value indicating whether there have been any notes attached to this record.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.History
member.summary: Gets a string listing all active audit events for this Record.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.HomeLocation
member.summary: Gets the home location of this Record. The home location is traditionally used to hold the storage location of a record. If the home location is a Space, this property has a null value and the home location is stored in the 'homeSpace' property. Use the Record.SetHomeLocation method to set the value of this property.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.HomeLocationStatus
member.summary: Gets the lsrecLocSubType enum value representing the home location status of the record. It indicates whether the Home Location is a Location ('At Location'), a container ('In Container'), or a Space ('In Space').

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.HomeSpace
member.summary: Gets the Space which this record calls home. This Space represents a location in a storage facility where the record sits.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.HomeSpaceNumber
member.summary: Gets the identifying number of the Space which this record calls home. This Space represents a location in a storage facility where the record sits.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.IdolMetadataXML
member.summary: Gets an XML-compliant string that lists the properties and field values of the record that should be included in the IDOL schema for indexing.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.InitiateTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets a Workflow Template object for a new record. If you set this property a new workflow will be created based on that template as part of the Save() operation for the record. Note that this property is a little special in that it cannot be set for an existing record - if you try to do that you will get an error. It really is only applicable for new records. The value of the property is also forgotten once the record has been created.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.Instructions
member.summary: Gets a string containing any instructions of all incomplete record actions.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.IsCheckedOut
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether the Electronic Document attached to this Record is currently checked out.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.IsContainer
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether this record has any contained records.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.IsContainerEx
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether this record has any contained records or alternately contains records.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.IsElectronic
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether this Record has an electronic document attached.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.IsEnclosed
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether this record is enclosed in its container, if it has a container. If the value is set to true then the record will take on the assignee location of the container. Use the Record.SetContainer method to enclose a record in its container, and the Record.SetCurrentLocation method to unenclose the record (but not permanently remove it) from its container. Use the Record.RemoveFromContainer method to remove a record permanently from its container.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.IsInPartSeries
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating if this record is part of a part series. That is it indicates if this record is related to any other record with a part relationship.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.IsRootOfPartSeries
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating if it was the first or original part, if the record is in a part series.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.IsShared
member.summary: Gets a boolean value indicating if this folder has been shared with an external sharing system

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.IsSigned
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether the electronic document attached to this record has been digitally signed.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.Jurisdictions
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing the list of jurisdictions associated with record ( a list of jurisdiction names separated by a semi-colon)

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.Keywords
member.summary: Gets a string listing all Thesaurus Terms attached to this Record. The string contains the Thesaurus Terms delimited by semicolons ';'.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.LastActionDate
member.summary: Gets or sets the latest date that this record has undergone one of the following actions: Change of location, Census, Action/Procedure attached, Action/Procedure completed, Electronic Document attached, existing Electronic Document replaced, New Part created, Record Title changed, Record Number changed, Record enclosed (if Record is a container) . This is NOT the last date of an Action, Procedure or Workflow attached to the record.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.LastPartRecord
member.summary: Gets the Record object for the latest part in the series, if this record is in a part series.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.LatestVersion
member.summary: Gets the Record object which is the latest version of this record.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.LongNumber
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique string identifier for the record number (expanded version).

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.M365Site
member.summary: Gets or sets a m365Site object indicating the Teams channel or Sharepoint site details of a ManageInPlace record

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.MakeInactiveDate
member.summary: Gets the date this record is due to be made inactive as a result of an applied Retention Schedule.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.ManualDestructionDate
member.summary: Gets or sets the date this Record is due to be destroyed. This is a manually set date which is used if the record has no retention schedule assigned.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.MatterName
member.summary: Gets a string which is equivalent to the record title of the matter record.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.MatterNumber
member.summary: Gets a string which is equivalent to the record number of the matter record.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.MatterRecord
member.summary: Gets or sets a record which is the matter record for this record. Can only set this property for new records that have the BelongToAMatter Record Type setting.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.MediaType
member.summary: Gets or sets a MediaTypes enumerated value to indicate the media type of this record.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.Meeting
member.summary: Gets the Meeting associated with this Record. If there is more than one Meeting, the most recent one is returned.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.MessageId
member.summary: Gets a string value which represents a unique identifier for a mail message.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.MimeType
member.summary: Gets or sets the Internet media type (MIME type) for the attached electronic document.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.MipBackupDate
member.summary: Gets the datetime representing the last datetime when a copy of the Mip document occurred.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.MipBackupId
member.summary: Gets a string representing the document id of the MiP backup copy.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.MipBackupStore
member.summary: Gets the document store representing the store where the backup copy is located.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.MovementHistory
member.summary: Gets a string listing all the Location changes (movements) in the history of this record. The string contains the Record Number, Event Type ('Assignee Changed'), new Assignee, the Location by whom the Assignee was changed, and the date of the Record movement.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.MyAuthorizationComments
member.summary: Gets or sets a string value indicating the comments provided by the currently logged in user as part of the document authorization process. The user must have been nominated in the list of authorizers for the record.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.MyAuthorizationComplete
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether the currently logged in user has completed the authorization of a record. The user must have been nominated in the list of authorizers for the record.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.MyReviewComments
member.summary: Gets or sets a string value indicating the comments provided by the currently logged in user as part of the document review process. The user must have been nominated in the list of reviewers for the record.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.MyReviewComplete
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether the currently logged in user has completed the review of a record. The user must have been nominated in the list of reviewers for the record.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.NbrPages
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of pages contained within the attached electronic document.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.NeedsAuthorization
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating that this record should be authorized before being finalized.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.NeedsDataEntryForm
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether the data entry form is required when saving this Record.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.NeedsReview
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating that this record should be subject to review before being finalized.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.NewPartCreationRule
member.summary: Gets or sets the Automated Part Rule for this Record which governs the automated closure and creation of new record parts based on predefined criteria, if there is an Automated Part Rule applied.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.NextPartRecord
member.summary: Gets the Record object for the next part in the series, if this record is in a part series and is not the latest part.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.NextTaskDue
member.summary: Gets a string containing details about the Scheduled Task attached to this Record that is due soonest. The details include the Scheduled Task's title, interval size and type, due date and Assignee, delimited by colons ':'. A Scheduled Task may be assigned to a record by setting the Record's classification to a Classification level with a Scheduled Task, or by setting the Record's class manually to 'Vital'.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.Number
member.summary: Gets the unique string identifier for the record number (compressed version).

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.OriginatedFrom
member.summary: Gets the origin object which this record was imported from.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.OriginatedFromRun
member.summary: Gets the origin run history which this record was imported from.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.OtherContact
member.summary: Gets or sets the contact location of type Other attached to this Record.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.OverdueActions
member.summary: Gets a string listing all Actions attached to this Record that are overdue. The string contains the Action name, Responsible Location and the remaining time for completion for each Action, with a new line for each Action.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.OwnerLocation
member.summary: Gets the owner location of this Record. The owner location is traditionally used to hold the owner of a record. Only users that belong to the owner location of a record can initially set its access controls. Use the Record.SetOwnerLocation method to set the value of this property.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.PreserveHierarchyOnDataEntry
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating if the hierarchy on the data entry form is to be preserved. It is used when preset values for Container or Classification are used and the SDK programmer wishes to prevent the user from changing the classification or the container on the data entry form.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.PrevPartRecord
member.summary: Gets the Record object for the previous part in the series, if this record is in a part series and is not the first part.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.PrimaryContact
member.summary: Gets the Contact location that has been set as the Primary Contact. Each record can only have one Primary Contact. Set the RecLocation.Primary property to modify the value of this property.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.Priority
member.summary: Gets or sets a string indicating the priority of the record. This is a standalone field which may be used to indicate a record's priority when there is no Action Tracking or Workflow being used.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.ReasonRecycled
member.summary: Gets a recycleReasons enumerated value indicating the reason this record was recycled.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.RecordType
member.summary: Gets or sets the record type that this record is based on. The record type determines many of the defaults used to create a new record and also affects features and properties available for the record during its lifecycle.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.RedactedFrom
member.summary: Gets a string containing the record from which this record was redacted. That is, all the records related to this record with relationship type: Was Redacted To. Use the Record.AddRelationship method to create Relationships between Records.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.RedactionsOf
member.summary: Gets a string listing the redactions of this record. That is, all the records related to this record with relationship type: Redaction Of. Use the Record.AddRelationship method to create relationships between records.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.RelatedRecord
member.summary: Gets or sets the Record which is related to this record with Relationship Type 'Related To'. If there is more than one related record, the most recently related record is returned.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.RelatedRecs
member.summary: Gets a string listing the Record Number, Record Title, and Record Relationship Type for all records related to this Record.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.RenditionCount
member.summary: Gets the number of renditions attached to this Record. A rendition is a copy of the Electronic Document attached to this Record in a different format, for example the OCR rendition of an image file.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.Representative
member.summary: Gets or sets the contact location of type Representative attached to this Record.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.Requests
member.summary: Gets a string listing all current requests for this record. The string includes the requested Record Number, the requesting Location and the DateTime needed. Requests are delimited by semicolons ';'.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.RetentionSchedule
member.summary: Gets or sets the Retention Schedule assigned to this Record. The Record's disposal schedule will be calculated based on this.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.ReturnDueDateTime
member.summary: Gets the date this record is due to be returned to its storage area after being on loan. This date is set by the Record.SetCurrentLocationEx method.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.ReviewDate
member.summary: Gets or sets the date that the attached Retention Schedule is due to be reviewed.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.ReviewDueDate
member.summary: Gets or sets a datetime value indicating the date when all document review activities should be complete and the document is ready to be authorized or finalized.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.ReviewersCanEdit
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean property indicating whether reviewers in the document review process are allowed to make changes to the document being reviewed.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.ReviewState
member.summary: Gets or sets a DocumentReviewStates value indicating which action is currently being untertaken for this record.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.ReviewStateDate
member.summary: Gets or sets a datetime value indicating the date when the previous document review action was completed and the current document review action was commenced.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.RevisionCount
member.summary: Gets a number indicating how many revisions of this document are currently stored as Revisions (includes the latest revision). This property involves a server round trip - if possible use the more efficient RevisionNumber property.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.RevisionNumber
member.summary: Gets the number of revisions the Electronic Document attached to this Record has been through. The original document will have Revision Number = 1.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.RootPartRecord
member.summary: Gets the Record object for the first part in the series, if this record is in a part series.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.SecCompliant
member.summary: Gets a boolean value indicating whether this record type implements SEC compliance rules. A record is SEC compliant if its attached document is in an SEC-Compliant document store.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.Security
member.summary: Gets or sets a string listing the security profile of the Record. It is made up of the security level and all caveats assigned to the record.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Record.GetDocument(System.String,System.Boolean,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the document associated with the record, extracting it to the filename specified in the outputDocumentName parameter. The checkDocumentOut parameter will allow you to lock the record so that no other user can edit it until you undo the checkout or check the document back in again. The comments parameter allows you to specify some comments which will be appended to the notes of the record. In some cases you may also want to record the place that the user has checked the document out to as a different place than the actual outputDocumentName parameter - if so you can specify this in the saveCheckoutPathAs parameter,

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Record.GetDocumentBackupCopy(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets the backup document associated with the record, extracting it to the filename specified in the outputDocumentName parameter. This will return an false if no backup copy of the document is available or there is an error extracting the backup copy (check the ErrorMessage property). Backup copies are only available for stores that implement a Manage In Place behavior.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Record.SetDocument(TRIM.SDK.InputDocument,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: Checks in the nominated Input Document as the electronic document for this record

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Record.DetachDocument
member.summary: Removes any electronic document currently associated with this record.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Record.SetAutoCheckin(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the record to automatically check-in its electronic document when the document is closed by the user. From 7.3, the record must be checked out to Offline Records, so the CheckinDocumentName parameter is no longer used and can be left blank. Recommend using OfflineRecord.SetAutoCheckin instead.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Record.GetEmailAttachment(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Gets a numeric value indicating the number of attachments contained in the email associated with this record Extracts an email attachment from the email associated with this record to the nominated file location.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Record.SetCheckedOutPath(System.String)
member.summary: Allows you to change the location where a document has been checked out to.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Record.UndoCheckout(System.String)
member.summary: Undo a previous checkout of the electronic document for this Record, disregarding any changes made since it was checked out.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Record.GetThumbnail(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets a thumbnail rendition of the Electronic Document, and it generate it if the rendition does not currently exist

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Record.GetSuggestedOutputPath(TRIM.SDK.OutputPathTypes,System.String)
member.summary: Gets a suggested filename or folder name for this record, based on the purpose you plan to use it for. If you leave the withinWindowsFolder parameter blank, the path returned will be in a TEMP folder

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Record.RestartDocumentReview(System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Allows you to restart document review process for this record. Set parameter setToReviewed to true will set the document review state to reviewing and false will set review state to editing. Set parameter clearReviewerFlags to true will reset completion status for document reviewers.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Record.CheckOutWorkingCopy
member.summary: Checkouts the document and creates a workingCopy BOB

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Record.GetWorkingCopy
member.summary: Returns the workingCopy object if a record has been checked out to workingCopy

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Record.CheckInWorkingCopy(System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: CheckIns the WorkingCopy BOB and delete the workingCopyBob

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Record.DeleteAndDeleteContents
member.summary: Deletes this record and also deletes all records contained within this record

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Record.DeleteAndUnlinkContents(TRIM.SDK.Location)
member.summary: Deletes this record and disassociates any contents from the container (i.e. all contents become 'unfiled'.)

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Record.BulkDeleteAndDeleteContents(TRIM.SDK.TrimMainObjectSearch,System.Boolean)
member.summary: BulkDelete is an efficient way of removing a lot of records quickly. It bypasses any cache notifications, so should only be be used for records that are unlikely to be opened for day to day usage. If any of the records have contained items, they will also be bulk deleted. For performance reasons, no audit logging is performed either.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Record.BulkDeleteAndUnlinkContents(TRIM.SDK.TrimMainObjectSearch,TRIM.SDK.Location,System.Boolean)
member.summary: BulkDelete is an efficient way of removing a lot of records quickly. It bypasses any cache notifications, so should only be be used for records that are unlikely to be opened for day to day usage. If any of the records have contained items, they will be moved out of the container and to the new home location provided. For performance reasons, no audit logging is performed either.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Record.CreateNewCopy(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new record which is a copy of this record. Returns a record object that is the new copy. It is not necessary to subsequently save the new record object to persist it to the TRIM Database

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Record.CreateNewCopy(TRIM.SDK.CopyRecordOptions)
member.summary: Creates a copy of this record using the specified copy options. Returns a record object that is the new copy. It is not necessary to subsequently save the new record object to persist it to the TRIM Database

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Record.CreateNewPart(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new part for this record. Returns a record object that is the new part record. It is not necessary to subsequently save the new part record object to persist it to the TRIM Database.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Record.CreateNewPart(TRIM.SDK.CopyRecordOptions)
member.summary: Creates a new part for this record using the specified copy options. Returns a record object that is the new part. It is not necessary to subsequently save the new part record to persist it to the TRIM Database.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Record.CreateNewVersion(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new version for this record. Returns a record object that is the new version. It is not necessary to subsequently save the new version record object to persist it to the TRIM Database

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Record.CreateNewVersion(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new version for this record, using the supplied file name rather than copying the latest revision. Returns a record object that is the new version. It is not necessary to subsequently save the new version record object to persist it to the TRIM Database

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Record.CreateNewVersion(System.String,System.String,TRIM.SDK.InputDocument)
member.summary: Creates a new version for this record, using the supplied InputDocument as the first revision, rather than copying the latest revision. Returns a record object that is the new version. It is not necessary to subsequently save the new version record object to persist it to the TRIM Database

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Record.CreateNewVersion(TRIM.SDK.CopyRecordOptions)
member.summary: Creates a new version for this record using the specified copy options. Returns a record object that is the new version. It is not necessary to subsequently save the new version record object to persist it to the TRIM Database

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Record.SetAsFinal(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets this record to finalized status. Once it is finalized, the electronic attachment of a record cannot be edited.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Record.SetAsDraft
member.summary: Sets this record from finalized to draft status.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Record.UnlinkOneDrive
member.summary: Transfers the document management functions for this record from OneDrive to Content Manager. Automatically commits the change.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Record.GetSuggestedNumber(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets the next available record number for a new record. Returns a string containing the suggested number.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Record.AutoCalculateNumber(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the next available record number for a new record. Also tests to ensure the calculated number is not already used. If it is used, it will iterate until an available number is found (up to the number of specified iterations). If the specified number of iterations is 0, the method will continually iterate until the number is found.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Record.SetOwnerLocation(TRIM.SDK.Location)
member.summary: Sets the owner location of this Record. Only users that belong to the owner location of a record can initially set its access controls. Use the Record.SetOwnerLocation method to set the value of this property.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Record.SetCreatorLocation(TRIM.SDK.Location)
member.summary: Sets the creator location of this Record.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Record.SetHomeLocation(TRIM.SDK.Location)
member.summary: Sets the owner location of this Record. This is mostly used for physical records and indicates where the record should normally reside

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Record.SetCurrentLocationAsMissing
member.summary: Sets the current location (assignee) to missing. A record is missing if it can not be physically located at any of its Current, Home or Owner Locations.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Record.SetCurrentLocationAtHome
member.summary: Sets the current location (assignee) to the home location of the record

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Record.SetHomeLocationAsSpace(TRIM.SDK.Space)
member.summary: Sets the home location of the record to be the nominated space

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Record.FindCurrentRequest
member.summary: Find the most relevant outstanding request for this record, if such a request exists.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Record.SetAssignee(TRIM.SDK.Location)
member.summary: Sets the assignee for this record to the nominated location. Allows a return due date to be specified.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Record.SetAssignee(TRIM.SDK.Location,TRIM.SDK.TrimDateTime)
member.summary: Sets the assignee for this record to the nominated location. Allows a return due date to be specified.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Record.SetAssignee(TRIM.SDK.Location,TRIM.SDK.TrimDateTime,TRIM.SDK.TrimDateTime)
member.summary: Sets the assignee for this record to the nominated location. Allows a return due date to be specified (but null is ok), and also, mainly for import purposes, allows you to specify when the assignee actually changed.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Record.AttachContact(TRIM.SDK.Location,TRIM.SDK.ContactType,System.Boolean)

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Record.AttachRelationship(TRIM.SDK.Record,TRIM.SDK.RecordRelationshipType)

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Record.AttachKeyword(TRIM.SDK.Keyword)
member.summary: Adds the nominated Thesaurus Term (keyword) to the list of attached Thesaurus Terms for this record. This method does not add the thesaurus term to the title of the record. Thesaurus titling is done by setting the 'GeneratedTitle' property of the Record.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Record.SetContainer(TRIM.SDK.Record,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Puts this record inside the nominated container. The container record must be of a record type with a higher container level than this record.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Record.RemoveFromContainer(TRIM.SDK.Location)
member.summary: Removes this record from its container. Resets the home location of the record to the nominated location.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Record.ImportHistoryEx(TRIM.SDK.Events,TRIM.SDK.TrimDateTime,System.String,System.String,TRIM.SDK.TrimObject,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates a new History object (Active Audit Event) for this record of the specified event type, importing the given history details.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Record.CompleteAllActions

member.summary: Gets the URL of one of the SharePoint List Items that is associated with this record

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Record.GetSpLirModifiedTitle(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the modified title of one of the SharePoint List Items that is associated with this record

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Record.AddSharePointListItem(System.Int64,TRIM.SDK.Record,System.String,TRIM.SDK.SpListItemOriginator,TRIM.SDK.SpManagedItemStatus,System.String)
member.summary: Establishes that this record is exposed in SharePoint as a SharePoint List Item with the supplied characteristics.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Record.RemoveSharePointListItem(System.Int32)
member.summary: Removes the link between this TRIM record and the SharePoint List Item at the nominated index.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.HasSharePointDocumentLink
member.summary: Gets a Boolean property indicating that this record manages a document that resides within SharePoint. Further details of this managed SharePoint item can be obtained by searching for SharePointItem objects associated with this record.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Record.DownloadSharePointDocument(System.String)
member.summary: This function is used for SharePoint documents that are managed in place. It allows you to download a document from SharePoint to the output file path specified. Use %TEMP% for the toOutputPath parameter if you wish the extract to create a temporary file, in which case the name of the created file is returned.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Record.TransferStorage(TRIM.SDK.ElectronicStore,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Transfers the electronic document attached to this record from its current storage location to a new electronic store.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Record.TransferStorageInPlace(TRIM.SDK.ElectronicStore,System.String)
member.summary: Transfers the electronic document attached to this record from its current storage location to a new electronic store at the specified location

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Record.TransferRevisions(TRIM.SDK.ElectronicStore)
member.summary: Transfers all old revisions of the electronic document attached to this record from their current storage location to a new electronic store.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Record.ConvertFromMIPStorage(TRIM.SDK.InputDocument)
member.summary: Converts a Manage In Place record to a regular record, using the specified InputDocument.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Record.MakeInactive(TRIM.SDK.TrimDateTime,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets the dateInactive for this record and any of its contents. When processing contents, you can specify whether the task should halt if any failures occur.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Record.MakeInactive(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets the dateInactive for this record and any of its contents. When processing contents, you can specify whether the task should halt if any failures occur.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Record.MakeActive(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Reverts the state of the record (and any of its contents) so that it is no longer inactive. When processing contents, you can specify whether the task should halt if any failures occur.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Record.Dispose(TRIM.SDK.DisposalType,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Disposes of this record (and any of its contents) according to specified disposal method. When processing contents, you can specify whether the task should halt if any failures occur.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Record.Undispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Reverts the state of the record (and any of its contents) so that it is no longer disposed. When processing contents, you can specify whether the task should halt if any failures occur.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Record.CanMakeInactive(TRIM.SDK.TrimDateTime)
member.summary: Tests whether the it is appropriate for this record to be made Inactive. If the function returns false, you can get more details by looking at the ErrorMessage property.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Record.CanMakeInactive
member.summary: Tests whether the it is appropriate for this record to be made Inactive. If the function returns false, you can get more details by looking at the ErrorMessage property.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Record.CanMakeActive
member.summary: Tests whether it is appropriate to reinstate this record to active. If the function returns false, you can get more details by looking at the ErrorMessage property.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Record.CanDispose(TRIM.SDK.DisposalType)
member.summary: Tests whether the specified disposal type is appropriate for this record. If the function returns false, you can get more details by looking at the ErrorMessage property.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Record.CanUndispose
member.summary: Tests whether it is appropriate to revert the disposal for this record. If the function returns false, you can get more details by looking at the ErrorMessage property.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Record.CloseRecord(TRIM.SDK.CloseRecordOptions)
member.summary: Use the CloseRecord function to close a container - leave the date blank if you want the close date to be "now". Because closing a record may require updating many contained records, this function commits the changes automatically.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Record.ReopenRecord(TRIM.SDK.ReopenRecordOptions)
member.summary: Use the ReopenRecord function to re-open a closed container. Because re-opening a record may require updating many contained records, this function commits the changes automatically.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Record.RequestRendition(TRIM.SDK.RenditionType)
member.summary: Allows you to create a request for the automatic rendering engine to make a rendition of this record.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.DataEntryFormDefinition
member.summary: Gets a specially formatted XML string describing the layout of the data entry form to be used to edit this record. This definition also includes any default values that should be displayed for the record. This will be obsoleted shortly, use the FormDefinition property instead

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Record.GetClassifiedSecurity
member.summary: Gets the Classified Security object which can be used to update security classification according to the US DoD Classified Security standard.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.Exclusions
member.summary: Gets or sets a list of locations that have been specified as being excluded access due to conflicts of interest in a matter

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Record.NotifyViewed
member.summary: This method records an "electronic document was viewed" event for active and offline audit logs, as appropriate. Used by the web service when passing off a cached document to a browser client.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.Record.HasDocumentHash
member.summary: Gets a boolean value indicating if there is an MD5 hash attached to this record that can be used to verify the attached document. If the function returns false, immediately check the ErrorMessage property for further information.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Record.RunHashCheck
member.summary: Returns a boolean value resulting from testing the electronic document attached to this record to see if it still matches the MD5 hash created at the time the record was submitted. If the function returns false, immediately check the ErrorMessage property for further information.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Record.CalculateHash
member.summary: Runs a special function to attach a hash to the record that can be used to verify the electronic document attached to this record. This will replace any existing hash if it is different. The hash is calculated using the 256-bit SHA hashing algorithm.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Record.GetContentRemovals(TRIM.SDK.TrimDateTime)
member.summary: Gets an array of record uris indicating all the records that have been removed from this folder since a certain date. Used for external folder synchronization

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Record.AddToRecycleBin(TRIM.SDK.RecycleReasons)
member.summary: Adds this record to the recycle bin. The record will no longer be available for normal record activities.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Record.AddToRecycleBin(TRIM.SDK.RecycleReasons,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Adds this record to the recycle bin. The record will no longer be available for normal record activities. Allows you to also specify whether to add a notes entry.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Record.AddToRecycleBin(TRIM.SDK.RecycleReasons,System.String)
member.summary: Adds this record to the recycle bin. The record will no longer be available for normal record activities. Allows you to also specify whether to add a notes entry.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Record.RestoreFromRecycleBin
member.summary: Restores the record back from the recycle bin. The record will be restored to the state it was in prior to being placed in the recycle bin.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Record.RestoreFromRecycleBin(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Restores the record back from the recycle bin. The record will be restored to the state it was in prior to being placed in the recycle bin. Allows you to also specify whether to add a notes entry.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Record.RestoreFromRecycleBinToDisposalFolder(TRIM.SDK.Record,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Restores the record back from the recycle bin and places it in the nominated disposal folder.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Record.DeleteFromRecycleBin
member.summary: Delete a record that is currently in the recycle bin

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Record.ChangeClient(TRIM.SDK.Record)
member.summary: Change the client associated with this matter record - for use when using the client/matter feature. Note that this method automatically commits the change, so no Save() is necessary and it should not be used with other transactions.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Record.ChangeMatter(TRIM.SDK.Record)
member.summary: Change the matter associated with this record - for use when using the client/matter feature. Note that this method automatically commits the change, so no Save() is necessary and it should not be used with other transactions.

member.name: M:TRIM.SDK.Record.UpdateContentId(System.String)
member.summary: Updates the external content ID property for this record. Use this when the external content ID has changed after record creation.

member.summary: Associates a standard entry from the Thesaurus with the parent Record

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.RecordKeyword.AttachMethod
member.summary: Gets a kaKeywordAttachMethod enum value indicating the method by which this keyword was attached to the parent Record. A keyword may be attached to a Record through setting the GeneratedTitle (kaByTitling) or by attaching the keyword manually by using the Record.AttachKeyword method (kaByAttach).

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.RecordKeyword.Description
member.summary: Gets a string containing the name of the keyword. The additional text '(Title)' appears after the Keyword name, if this RecKeyword was used in the titling of the parent Record.

member.summary: Gets the base Keyword object corresponding to this RecKeyword.

member.name: P:TRIM.SDK.RecordKeyword.Prompt
member.summary: Gets a string containing the prompted text entered by the user at the time of creating the parent Record. Has a value only in the case where the Keyword object corresponding to this RecKeyword is a prompt term which has been used in titling the parent Record.
